«Zaɗka bulu naari ɗo ɓil law kɔr ɓáy na, *hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗaa ɓáy huɔ na ɗo sakra ɓari a kiɛ ri mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ziŋ ri. Hulke ku na, i ɗaa munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi nzi-ɛ a kiɛ Moyze faa ɗáake ha̰ ni ɗaa munu káʼa kɔ ɓáy nun-ɛ.

Hulke ku na, vu bulu naari pɔŋ ha̰ vu ɓari. A ɓari na laa lɛ, i soɓ í séke fal *Zozuye ká nda faa pol-ri kpṵru í tḭ́ike tusiri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nii sa̰w nzoɓri ká i kaw ɗi na pol-ri. Hulke ku na ɗo kpṵru tḭi sewke ká *Daviɗ réke mbay.
Ɓe Daviɗ na ka rii nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a vbi ni faa ɓay ɗáa hul ha̰ ɓe káʼa ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Zakoɓ na, ka ɗaa puo ká ɗi.
Roo lɛ, ɓa vi-e Salomo̰n ze ɗaa hul ha̰ ni.
Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue siya káʼa ɓa Ŋgɛrɛ Tul Feri Riw Bele na, kaw ɓil hul ká nzoɓ ɗaa ɓáy nduo-ɛ na ya, munu ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzi-ɛ mii:
“Nulue siya ɓa zaɗ réke mbay ɓi,
a tusiri key ɓa zaɗ tɔkɔ ɓal-i.
Wa̰a, kḭri hul ḭi rɔɓay, ì ɗáa ɓay haŋa mì lɛ?
Wa̰a, zaɗ ha̰a ze ì ɗaa ɓa zaɗ mgbaka ta̰ram ɓi lɛ?
Fe niri key na wa̰a, ɓa ɓi ze, mì ɗaa riw bele ya lɛ
«Ɓaarì nzoɓ tul ŋgɔŋɔri ká law-rì mbii diɓ diɓ, ká suku-rì tḭi sṵy í laa ɓay ya nda̰w na! Ì tuŋ Tem Law Pie ŋgereŋ ɓaŋguɔ! Ɓaarì na ì ɗo munu ká bulu ɓaarì na ǔɔ!

Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, nzoɓ taa ha̰a ze bulu ɓaarì na laɗ ɗáa nun-ɛ tuɔ síe lɛ? Ɓari na, i i nzoɓri ká i vi pola í ka-káa ɓay se tul vika Nzoɓ Fe Ɗáa Ɓáy Zaɗɛ na. Ɓa ɓe na ze, timbɛɗɛ ì mbi tul-e í i ni.
Ɓaarì ká ì ya̰a *bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy faa leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue na, ì ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul bol kusol key na ya!»
Zaɗka *nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, law-ri fa̰a ri puu-u, í sṵ sere-ri ŋgɛ̌r ŋgɛ̌r ká tul Etḭɛn.
Roo lɛ, Etḭɛn ká Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ɛ na kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa nulue, lɛ, ka kɔ riŋ ɗika Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Zezu ká ɗo siya ká tunduo hoɗo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru
a ɓaa mii: «Ì laa key! Mì kɔ nulue mgbuɗa ɗo hɔy, mí kɔ *Vu Nzoɓ ɗo siya ká tunduo hoɗo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru!»
Zaɗka i laa ɓayke munu báyḭi lɛ, i guu ni gɔ̌m í ɗaa nduo-ri mbii basuku-ri í takra í ɗuu vbuɓuɓu ɓa tul-e,

í mgba ni í tḭ́ike ni saa ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na ŋgereŋ ɓa nzaa zaɗ nda̰w rɔɔ, í tii sa̰w vbúku ni ɓáy tisaw ɓay ika ni ɓáy. Nzoɓ nasi ɓay huɗ ɓeri na, i nan gari ɓari í ha̰ leɗ kuban mbḭw munu ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Sol ha̰ ni kɔrɔ.
Zaɗka i ɗo vbúku ni kɔɓ rɔɓay na, Etḭɛn ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere a ɓaa mii: «Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu! Mu ya̰a ɔ̰mi ɓi ɓa luo-ɔ!»
Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, ka huku siri mgbṵu a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere rɔɓay ɓáy bawda kusol-e mii: «Mbay, mu ɗaa ɓay feya̰a key na ka ɓo tul-ri ya!» Fal ɓay na ku báyḭi lɛ, ɔ̰mi ɓe tḭi ha̰ ni haw saɗak.
Ɓay ká se tul huɗ ɓe na, Sol na hii ziŋ ri nda̰w.

Namke ku na, bawda fe ɗáa nun tuɔ síe tḭi tul nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zuruzalɛm ha ri ɗuu í zekre kḭ kpɛrkɛ kpɛrkɛ, í se ɓil puori ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude ɓáy Samari, lɛ, bele ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri huo-ri hɔy ze i tɔ̀ŋ ká ɗi.
Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa nzoɓ hḭ́ɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na i mbi huɗ Etḭɛn na í vǎa voro, í rɛ huɗ ɓe na ɓamba ɓáy mbii nun-ri mgboɓo mgboɓo.
Sol laa lɛ, nzaa faa ɓáy hṵrusuo ɓay ɓíɛ nzoɓ mbika lawri, a se ɓáy hula ŋgeɓre ŋgeɓre a fa̰a má̰yri ɓáy wa̰rari ká i ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri na ŋgiɗ bele, a ɗaa ri zuɔ hul sal.
Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i zekre kḭ na i se ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ, í ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri laa.
Filiɓ na se ŋgɛrɛpuo mbḭw munu ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari, a ka-káa ɓay *Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa a pie ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na ha̰ nzoɓri laa.
Zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele laa ɓay Filiɓ, a í kɔ fe saŋri káʼa ɗaa na báyḭi lɛ, i te suku-ri kie ɓa luo-ɛ.
Ka ha̰ temndayari tḭi saa tul nzoɓ ɓala ha̰nɛri ŋgḭi ɓamba. Tḭ́i ɓari na, i guu fe ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ. Ka ha̰ nzoɓri ká sùo-ri hu wǔɔ ɓáy nzoɓ kpɛɗɛri ŋgḭi ɓamba vaa kɛɓrɛ kɛɓrɛ,
ha̰ nzoɓri zay sùo-ri ɓamba tasiri ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke na ku.
Nzoɓ mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Simo̰n kaw ɓil puoke ku, a ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭi, ha̰ *nzoɓri ká Samari na i kaw yer. Ka kɔ sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ luye
ha̰ ɓari riw bele, tii saa tul leɗri kpṵru tḭi tul ŋgɛrɛri na, i te suku-ri kie ɓay láa ɓay ɓe na í ɓaa mii: «Ɓe ni key na ɓa hṵrusuo taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗi ni ɓa “Hṵrusuo Ŋgḭ́ike”.»
I te suku-ri riw bele ɓay láa ɓay ɓe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa piɛɗ lew hɔy, ka ɗaa fe ha ri kaw yer ɓay tul fe ɗáa mgbḭi ɓeri na.
Roo lɛ, zaɗka i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ɓay Kere ká Filiɓ ka-káake se tul Zezu Krisi, ɓáy réke mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká tul nzoɓri na báyḭi lɛ, má̰yri ɓáy wa̰rari na ha ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii.

Ɓe Simo̰n kḭ sùo-ɛ kara ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul ɓay na ku, a ha ri ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii na. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka zɔl mbǎa a rḭi tul Filiɓ ɓaŋguɔ. Fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ká Filiɓ ɗaa káʼa kɔ na tuku ni ha̰ ni kaw yer.
Báyḭi lɛ, *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ká i kaw Zuruzalɛm na i laa mii, nzoɓri ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari na, i ya̰a Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ro, í pie Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ha ri se luo-ri.
Zaɗka i tḭi Samari na báyḭi lɛ, i vǎa mbṵ nzoɓ mbika law fieri na, í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ká tul-ri ɓay haŋa Tem Law Pie ka ví ya̰a ɓil law-ri,
ɓay ḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ví ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku na ya rɔɓay; i ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu hɔy.
Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ɗaa nduo-ri ɓo tul-ri ha̰ Tem Law Pie ví ya̰a ɓil law-ri.
Zaɗka Simo̰n kɔ mii, Tem Law Pie ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓ ɓáy faa ɗáa nduo ɓo tul nzoɓ ká nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɗaa na báyḭi lɛ, ka wal lari a ha̰ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a
a ɓaa ha ri mii, «Ha̰ mì hṵrusuo na key nda̰w ɓo, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká mì ɗaa nduo-i ɓo tul-e lɛ, Tem Law Pie ka ya̰a ɓil law-ɛ munu na nda̰w.»
Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu ɓíɛ ɓáy lari ɓo na kpukɗu kpukɗu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mù ker ká ɓil law-a mii, fe ini Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, mù maa híe ɓáy lari.
Peɗ ká ɓuru ɗaa na, ɓay ɓo ti ɓil-e ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓo na, mù ɗo sikɗa ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya.
Mu suo kér ɓay ɓo ká tul fe ɗáa ka̰aya ɓo, mú koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ɓo, faa ɗo ku lɛ, ka nda buma ziŋ mù ká tul kḭri kér ɓay ɓo ká mini key na,
ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì kɔ mù lɛ, law-a zoŋ bak bak ɓamba, a feya̰a kara síŋ mù kɔɗɔk nda̰w.»

Zaɗka Simo̰n laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a mii: «Ɓaarì kara, ì ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓay tul-i, ɓay haŋa ɓay ká ì ɓaa ziŋ mì key na, ka tḭi tul-i munu na ya.»

Falɛ ká Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ɓaa nasi ɓay Zezu Krisi í ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay ha ri ká zaɗɛ ku na báyḭi lɛ, i mbi faa ɓay yḭ́i ɓa Zuruzalɛm. Seɗ ɓari ká faa na, i ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri ká ɓil puo ha̰wri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari.
Leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbḭw munu tḭi tul Filiɓ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úru siya mú se nun-a mak ɓa fi hoɗo, mú mbi faa ká nzoɓri se ɗi ɓamba ya ká uru saa Zuruzalɛm a se ɓa Gaza na mú kɔ».

Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy Filiɓ uru a se faa na, lɛ, ka kɔ leɗban mbḭw munu ká tusiri Etiyopi. Ɓa nzoɓ ká i lo gum-ɛ lo a ɓa leɗ káw mbay ká ɓa má̰y nzoɓ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Kandas, a ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ feziŋa mbay na riw bele. Leɗbanke ku na, ka se Zuruzalɛm ɓay kóɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗi.
Yḭ́i ɓe ɓa puɔ na ka kaw ɓil puupusu ɓe, a ɗo kḭiŋa mbeɗe ká Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa.
Lɛɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha̰ Filiɓ mii: «Mu se nun-a ɓa pola ɓa lakun puupusu ku.»

Báyḭi lɛ, Filiɓ ɗuu nun-ɛ ɓa pola a tḭi zaɗ na, lɛ, ka laa kusol nzoɓ ká Etiyopi ká ɗo kḭiŋa mbeɗe Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na. Ro, a vbi ni mii: «Fe ká mù kḭi key na wa̰a, mù kɔ sa̰wke kɔ kḭ lɛ?»
Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka nzoɓ kiɛ mì ya na wa̰a, mì ɗáa mina mí kɔ sa̰wke lɛ?» Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ Filiɓ hil a kaw ziŋ ni.
Ɓay káʼa kḭi ká ɓil mbeɗe na ze ɗo key:
«I mgba ni í kuɔ ni, munu ká i mgba baɗu í kuɔ ni
í séke ɓa zaɗ ika ni.
Munu ɓa vu baɗu ká i mgba ni ɓay mún sṵyke
káʼa aa nzi-ɛ a rɛ-rɛw ya na;
ɓe na kara, ka mgbuɗa nzi-ɛ a ɓaa ɓay mbḭw ya.
I ɗaa sahoy ɓo tul-e, a í ɗaa ɓay ɓe ɓáy zaɗɛ ya.
Ku waa, vu bul-eri ɗo ha̰a ɓáy rɔɔ, nzoɓ a ɓáa ɓay se tul-ri lɛ,
ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kuŋ nam ɓe gak ká tusiri key
Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na vbi Filiɓ mii: «Mì koɗ mù, mu ɓaa ha̰ mì laa. Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ni key na ɓaa ɓay se tul ve lɛ? Se tul ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ mase, se tul nzoɓ kḭ lɛ?»
Báyḭi lɛ, Filiɓ mbi ɓay káʼa kḭi ká ɓil mbeɗe na, a tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay Ɓay Kere ká se tul Zezu na ha̰ ni.

Munu ká i se nun-ri ɓa pola ɓáy na, i tḭi zaɗ mbḭw ká mbii ɗo ɗi. Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na vbi Filiɓ mii: «Mu kɔ, mbii ze ɗo key! Wa̰a, fe ḭi ze haa faa ɓay haŋa mù ɗaa tul-i nduo mbii na lɛ?»

[Lɛɛ, Filiɓ yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka mù ɗaa law-a ɓo tul Zezu kḭ lɛ, náa ɗáa.» Nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɗaa law-i ɓo tul-e ɓa tusuɛ kḭ. Mì kɔ Zezu *Krisi na ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»]
Nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na ta̰a ɓáy puupusu na. Falɛ ku lɛ, ɓe ɓáy Filiɓ na i ɗì saa ɗi siɗi bele í vǎa ɗo ɓil mbii ha̰ Filiɓ ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii.
Zaɗka i tḭi saa mbii na ku báyḭi lɛ, Tem Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbi Filiɓ na a zéeke serere ha̰ nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na kɔ sùo-ɛ mbǎa. Ze munu hɔy kara, ka mbi bufaa ɓe ɓáy bawda suoriya ká ɓil law-ɛ.
A Filiɓ na lɛ, tḭi ká Azot lew kpeɗere. Falɛ lɛ, ka se puo ɓáy puo a ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri kpṵru a tḭ́ike ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Sezare.
Sewke ku na Sol ɗaa nun nzoɓri ká i se fal Ŋgɛrɛmbay na tuɔ síe ɓaŋguɔ, law-ɛ nzɛ mgbuk mgbuk a hii ɓay ika ri. Ka se luo *ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye

a vbi ni mbeɗe ɓay séke *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri ká ɗo ŋgɛrɛpuo Damas ɓay haŋa ri kɔ́ke ni. Mbeɗeke ku na ɓaa mii, zaɗka ɓeri ziŋ wa̰ra nzoɓ, mase má̰y nzoɓ ká mbi Faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay lɛ, ɓeri mgba ri ɓeri séke ri Zuruzalɛm.
Zaɗkaʼa zɔl a se ɗi ya deɓ ɓay tḭ́i Damas na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy zaɗ hie gbɛrɛrɛ saa nulue a kiri ni gbuk.
Lɛɛ, ka lie raɗ ɓo siri, a laa kusol nzoɓ ká ɗi ni mii: «Sol! Sol woo! Sa̰wke mina rɔɔ, mù ɗaa nun-i tuɔ síe munu lɛ?»
Báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, wa̰a, mù ɓa ve lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓa Zezu ká mù ɗaa nun-i tuɔ síe na.
Úru siya mú se ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na ku, lɛ, i kíɛ mù fe ká ɗo nun haŋa mù ɗaa na.»
Lɛɛ, wa̰rari ká i se ziŋ Sol na, i ta̰a í ɗo tul kḭ silili í laa kusol nzoɓ ká mgba na, roo lɛ, i kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw ya.
Sol na uru saa siri, lɛ, ka kɔ zaɗ mbḭw ya ha ri mgba nduo-ɛ mgba í kuɔ ni í séke Damas.
Nam ká say na, ka kɔ zaɗ ya, a sṵ fe ya nda̰w, a nzɔ mbii ya nda̰w pi.
Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká mbi fal Ŋgɛrɛmbay, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Ananiyas kaw Damas. Báyḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay tina nun ha̰ ni a ɗi ni mii: «Ananiyas!» Lɛɛ, ka hii nzi-ɛ mii: «Mbay, mì ɗo key ɓay láa ɓay ɓo.»

Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úru siya mú se faa ká ɓo ɓil puɔ ká i ɗi ɓa Faa Ká Ɗo Kparak, mú nzaa nzoɓ mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Sol ká uru saa Tars, a kaw ɓil puo ká Zudas ku, a ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere.
Zaɗkaʼa ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere na, fe tina nun ha̰ ni. Ɓa ɓo Ananiyas ze mù rìi tul-e ɓay ɗáa nduo-ɔ ɓo tul-e, ɓo ha̰ ni kɔ zaɗ ɓa kḭ rɔɓay.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Ananiyas yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mì laa ɓayri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ká nzoɓri ɓaa se tul leɗban na ká ɗaa ndaya ziŋ nzoɓ taa ɓori ká Zuruzalɛm na.
Ka vi zaɗ ni key ɓáy mbeɗe ká uru saa luo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓay mgbakake nzoɓri ká i ɗi riŋ-a.»
Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓi kḭ ze mì naa leɗban na key ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa riŋ-i nda zaɗ ká sa̰w nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ nda̰w, pol mbayri nda̰w, rɔɔ sakra leɗ Izarayɛlri nda̰w pi.
Ɓi kḭ ze, mì kíɛ ni kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ feri riw bele káʼa kɔ́kɔ ɓay tul-i na ɓáy.»

Zaɗka Ananiyas zɔl a tḭi puɔ na báyḭi lɛ, ka rìi a se tul Sol ká hula a ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul-e a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Yṵ-i Sol, Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ká tḭi tul-a ká faa ɓáy ví ɓo ká Damas na, ɓe kḭ ze ka pie mì ɓay haŋa mù kɔ zaɗ ɓa kḭ nda̰w, ɓay haŋa Tem Law Pie ka mbaa ɓil law-a nda̰w pi.»
Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, feri ga̰y kpeɓre kpeɓre saa nun Sol munu ká hoy feri a zuɔ siri ha̰ ni kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa kḭ rɔɓay. Lɛɛ, ka uru siya a ha ri ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii.
Falɛ ku lɛ, ka sṵ-sṵm ha̰ hṵrusuo-ɛ yḭ̀i a vi ɗi ɓa kḭ.
Sol na ɗaa nam ha̰nɛri ziŋ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Damas.
Ɓa vaa hɔy lɛ, ka tii sa̰w ka-káa ká ɓil *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri mii, Zezu na ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.

Nzoɓri riw bele ká i laa ɓayke na, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer í vbi kḭ ɓay mii, «Wa̰a, ɓa leɗban ni key ká ɗaa nun nzoɓri ká i ɗi riŋ Zezu na tuɔ síe ká Zuruzalɛm ya lɛ? Ɓa ɓe káʼa vi ɓay mgbaka nzoɓri ɓay séke ri ha̰ *ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri na ya lɛ woo?»

Báyḭi lɛ, Sol ziŋ hṵrusuo ɓa pola pola a káake káa ɓay a kiɛ nzoɓri fe mii, Zezu ɓa *Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa a pie ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na. Lɛɛ, Ziɓri ká i kaw Damas na, i kɔ faa ká ɓay yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mbǎa.
Falɛ káʼa ɗaa nam ha̰nɛri na báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓri mbṵ kḭ í mbi nzaa-ri ɓay ika ni.
Roo lɛ, ɓayke tɔɗɔ ɓo suku Sol. Nzoɓri ká Damas kɔrɔ faari ká tḭi saa ŋgɛrɛpuo na riw bele, suŋ ɓáy ɓisie ɓay ika ni.
Báyḭi lɛ, nam mbḭw munu ɓa suŋ, nzoɓri ká i mbi lawri ɓáy faa Sol na, i mbi ni í ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil buɗu í hǐlke kɔ̀kɔ dudu, í ɗǐrake ni ɓo fal kɔ̀kɔ na ha̰ ni zɔl.
Sol na yḭ̀i a se Zuruzalɛm a nzaa faa ɓay zúɔ ziŋ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká ɗi. Roo lɛ, ɓari riw bele na i ɗaa hḭɛ ɓe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ mbika law taa tusuɛke ya.

Báyḭi lɛ, Barnabas sùu ni a séke luo *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri, a kḭi ɓay fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa ziŋ Sol ká faa ɓáy faa ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓǎake ɓay ziŋ ni na. Ka ɓaa ha ri na rɔɓay mii, Sol ka-káa ɓay ká se tul Zezu ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ ká Damas.
Úru saa síeke ku na, Sol na zuɔ ziŋ ri mbḭw a ha̰ari ziŋ ri, a ka-káa ɓáy riŋ Zezu ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ ká Zuruzalɛm.
Ka ɓaa ɓay a ma̰y ɓay ziŋ Ziɓri ká i ɓaa nzaa gɛrɛk nda̰w. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ku na i nzaa faa ɓay ika ni.
Zaɗka ɓayke tɔɗɔ ɓo suku nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i kɔ Sol ɓa yṵ ɓari na báyḭi lɛ, i sùu ni í séke Sezare í ha̰ ni kal kpṵru a se Tars.

Ɓe nu ku laa lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude, Galele nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy Samari nda̰w na, i ya̰a ɔ̰mi fṵɔ a í kaw ɗɛkɛkɛ. Ɓari na i ha̰ hṵrusuo ha̰ kḭ í hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaŋguɔ, a í ŋgḭ̌ike ɓa pola pola ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie ká sɔ ri na.
Ɓil sewke ku na Piyɛr se ɓáy puori riw bele ɓay kɔ-kɔ́m. Lɛɛ, nam mbḭw munu na ka se ɓay kɔ́kɔ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i kaw Lida,
lɛ, ka ziŋ leɗban mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Ene naa híi suosɛrɛm mbiimbam tɔnɔ siɗi ro, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓal-ɛ hu wǔɔ.
Ro, a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ene, Zezu *Krisi vaa mù ro. Úru siya mú léke fe nam ɓo.» Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, leɗban na uru siya.
Zaɗka nzoɓri ká Lida ɓáy nzoɓri ká Saro̰n riw bele kɔ nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ vaa ni na báyḭi lɛ, i suo kér ɓay ɓari í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
Lɛɛ, má̰y mbḭw munu kaw sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zope, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Tabita. (Ɓáy nzaa gɛrɛk lɛ, ɓa
Sewke ku na sùo-ɛ sɛ ni ha̰ ni hu. Falɛ ká i sùo ni mbii huɗ ɔ riw bele báyḭi lɛ, i mbi ni i vǎa ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil hul ká̰y tul kḭ ká ɗo siya.

Munu ká Lida ɗo ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy Zope na, zaɗka nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zope laa mii, Piyɛr ɗo Lida na báyḭi lɛ, i pie wa̰rari ɓa siɗi ɓay haŋa ri vǎa kóɗ Piyɛr ha̰ ni ka vi koɗ hɔy ziŋ ri ɓo, ka mgba roy ya.

Piyɛr na uru ɓa vaa hɔy a se ziŋ ri. Zaɗkaʼa tḭi ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, i sùu ni í séke ɓil hul ká̰y tul kḭ ká ɗo siya. Má̰y síeri riw bele i ví kiri ni ɓáy rɛw í kiɛ ni ŋgamasiri ɓáy gari ha̰wri káʼa sa̰a ha ri ɓáy káw ɓe ɓáy kumnun rɔɓay na.

Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr tina nzoɓri riw bele ká i kaw hula na tḭi kɛlɛ, a huku siri a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka uru a kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa huɗ na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Tabita, úru siya!» Lɛɛ, ka mgbuɗa nun-ɛ a kɔ Piyɛr a uru a kaw.
Ro, Piyɛr na mgba nduo-ɛ a sɔ ni ha̰ ni uru siya. Falɛ lɛ, ka ɗi nzoɓ mbika lawri ɓáy má̰y síeri na, a kiɛ ri Tabita ká yḭ̀i a kaw ɓáy kumnun na.
Ɓayke ku na, nzoɓ Zoperi riw bele laa ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na kaw Zope a ɗaa nam maa fe ká ɓil puo Simo̰n ká ɓa nzoɓ gbáa huɔ.
Nzoɓ mbḭw munu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Kɔrney kaw Sezare. Ka ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm ká puoruo Rɔm káʼa re tul nzoɓ yṵmri ɓa isɔɗ. Kuɗu nzoɓ yṵmkeri ku na i ɗi ri ɓa «nzoɓ yṵmri ká Itali.»
Leɗbanke ku na ɓa nzoɓ ká hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a koɗ ni ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓeri riw bele. Ka mgba ini ŋgḭi ɓamba ziŋ nzoɓ kṵkuri ká i ɓa Ziɓri, a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara.
Nam mbḭw munu ká síe fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, fe tina nun ha̰ ni kɔ leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbḭw munu ta-taŋ rìi tul-e ká hula a ɗi ni mii: «Kɔrney!»

Lɛɛ, Kɔrney kɔ leɗ nzaapeɗ na ɓáy hḭɛ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mina lɛ?» Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Nzaa ɓay kere ɓo ká mù ɗaa na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru la-laa, a ini ká mù mgba ziŋ nzoɓ kṵkuri kara ka kɔ nda̰w, ze a kěrke se tul-a.
Munu zu lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na, mu pie wa̰rari ha ri se Zope í vǎa nzaa Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na ha̰ ni vi.
Ka naa hul Simo̰n, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ gbáa huɔ na. Hul ɓe ɗo nzaa maambii lɛr.»
Falɛ ká leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ ni a zɔl na báyḭi lɛ, Kɔrney ɗi leɗ káw ɓeri ɓa siɗi, a ɗi nzoɓ yṵm mbḭw ká hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká sakra ɓari ku káʼa kaw tul-ri na,
a kḭi fal feri ká kal na riw bele ha ri laa. Fal ɓayri káʼa kḭi na báyḭi lɛ, ka pie ri se Zope na.
Nzaaruoke ká i se faa rɔɓay ká í tɔ̀ŋ ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy Zope na báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr hil a ɗo tul hul siya ɓay ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ɓáy síe ká ɗo law tul.
Lɛɛ, kɔn sɛ ni ha̰ ni hii ɓay sṵŋa fe. Zaɗka i ɗo ɗáa fe sṵm ɓay haŋa ni sṵ na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ fe tina nun ha̰ ni.
Lɛɛ, ka kɔ nulue mgbuɗa ɗo hɔy gbɛrɛrɛ, ha̰ ni kɔ fe rìi gari a aa gboroŋ ká i siŋ sal ɗo tḭwke niŋ bele uru saa ɗi a ɓo siri.
Ká ɓil feke ku na, kḭri nayri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele ɗo ɓil-e, nayri ká ɓal-ri niŋ niŋ nda̰w, feri ká i koro siri ɓáy ɓil-ri nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy kḭri nduyri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ nda̰w pi.
Lɛɛ, ka laa kusol nzoɓ ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Piyɛr, úru siya ɓo mú i mú sṵ!»
Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Úwaa! Mbay, fe ká Ziɓri haa sṵ́ŋake í kɔ ɓa fe ká ndaya, mase ɓa fe ḭ̌m ká mini key na, mì mbi ɓo nzaa-i ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ.»
Ndeke ɗi ba siɗike na, ka laa kusol nzoɓ ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ta-taŋ mii, ɓa fe kere na, kɔkɔ ká mu kɔ ɓa fe ḭ̌m.»
Feke ku na vi mini faa ɓal ba say, lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy i kuɔ feke na i yḭ̌ike ɓa nulue ɓa kḭ.
Zaɗka Piyɛr kaw a ker se tul sa̰w fe ká tina nun ha̰ ni na kpṵy báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká Kɔrney pie ri na, i vbi faa ká se ɓa hul Simo̰n na kpṵru, i vǎa tḭi ɗi í ɗo faa hul,
í ɗi ɗiw í vbi ɓay mii: «Zaɗ ni key ze Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na naa ɗi lɛ?»
Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na ɗo kér ɓay sa̰w fe ká tina nun ha̰ ni na ɓaŋguɔ. Báyḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Á̰y, mu kɔ, nzoɓri ɓa say i ɗo key í vbi ɓay ɓo.
Mu úru siya mú ɗì mú vǎa ziŋ ri ɓo, mú se zíŋ ri taŋ má̰y ɓay, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa ɓi kḭ ze mì pie ri.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɗì a ziŋ ri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká ì nzaa ni na, ɓa ɓi zu. Wa̰a, sa̰wke mina rɔɔ ì vi key lɛ?»

Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Kɔrney ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm na ze pie ɓuru vi luo-ɔ key. Ɓe na, ka ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ káʼa ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ká Ziɓri riw bele ɓaa ɓay ɓe ɓáy kere na. Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓe mbḭw saa nulue se luo-ɛ a ɓaa ɓay ziŋ ni. Ze a pie ɓuru ɓay haŋa mù se luo-ɛ ɓo, ɓay ká mù ɗǒke na, mu ɓaa ha̰ ni laa.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ha ri ví naa ziŋ ni. Nzaaruoke na, ka uru a se ziŋ ri. Yṵ-ɛ ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa nzoɓ mbika law ká i kaw Zope na, i su ni í se ziŋ ni nda̰w.
Ndeke ɗi nam siɗike na, i tḭi Sezare. Pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ri tḭi Sezare na, Kɔrney ɗi nzoɓ ini ɓeri ɓáy nzoɓ buɔ-ɛ ha̰yri ká i ɓa bǎw soro ɓe na ha ri kaw í giyaŋ ri.
Zaɗka Piyɛr ɗo ríi ɓa hula na báyḭi lɛ, Kɔrney suɔ nun-ɛ a huku siri mgbṵu a ɗiŋ tul-e ká pol-e.
Roo lɛ, Piyɛr ura ni ɗo siya a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu ɗo ɓáy zaɗ gaŋa ɓo, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓi kara mì ɓa nzoɓ munu ká ɓo na nda̰w.»
Lɛɛ, seɗ ɓari ɓa hula na, ka lo soro ziŋ ni, rɔɔ í tḭ́ike tul nzoɓ ruɔri ká i mbṵ kḭ na.

Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na ì kɔ nda̰w, Ziɓ ha̰a ha̰a kara, i haa ni ɓay haŋa ni se luo nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya, mase ɓay ríi ɓil hul ɓari ya nda̰w. Roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kiɛ mì ha̰ mì kɔ mii, ɗo nun haŋa mì kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw mini ɓa nzoɓ ká ndaya, mase ɓa nzoɓ ḭ̌m ya.
Sa̰wke mini ze, zaɗka ì pie ha̰ mì na, mì vi taŋ má̰y ɓay. Timbɛɗɛ key na, mì hii ɓay kɔ́kɔ, wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì pie ha̰ mì vi lɛ?»

Lɛɛ, Kɔrney yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Nam niŋ ro vuri, ká síe fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ a ɗo mini ká timbɛɗɛ key ká mì ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ká ɓil hul ɓi na, nzoɓ mbḭw munu nduo gari ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri tḭi tul-i mbuɗa a ɓaa ha̰ mì mii:
“Kɔrney, nzaa ɓay kere ɓo ká mù ɗaa na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru la-laa, a ini ká mù mgba ziŋ nzoɓ kṵkuri kara, ka kɔ nda̰w, ze a kěrke se tul-a.
Mu pie nzoɓri ha ri se Zope í vǎa nzaa Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na ha̰ ni vi. Ka naa hul Simo̰n, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ gbáa huɔ ká hul ɓe ɗo nzaa maambii lɛr na.”

Zaɗɛ ku hɔy mì pie nzoɓri vǎa nzáa mù, lɛ, mù ɗaa ɓáy kere mú vi na kḭ. Timbɛɗɛ key na, ɓuru riw bele ɓuru ɗo pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay láa ɓayri riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay hii ɓay haŋa mù ɓaa ha̰ ɓuru laa na.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na mì kɔ lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa nun nzoɓ ya,
roo lɛ, sa̰w nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká hḭɛ ni a ɗaa fe ɓáy zaɗɛ na, ka ya̰a ni ɓáy kere.
Ɓe na, ka ha̰ nzoɓri vǎa ka-káa ɓay ɓe ha̰ leɗ Izarayɛlri. Ɓa Ɓay Kere ká se tul ɗɛkɛkɛ ká ɗo sakra ɓe ɓáy nzoɓri ɓáy faa Zezu *Krisi ká ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay tul nzoɓri riw bele.
Fal namri ká Za̰a ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii na, fe ká tḭi ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele ɓáy Zude riw bele na, ɓa fe ká ɓaarì hɔy kara ì kɔ nda̰w.

Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ ɗo ɓoɗ a ha̰ Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ɛ a ha̰ ni hṵrusuo. Ka se ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ a ɗaa fe kereri nda̰w, a vaa nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɗo ɓil koy ŋgɛrɛtemndaya riw bele nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ziŋ ni.
Ɓuru na, ɓuru ɓa nzoɓ nasi ɓay feri riw bele káʼa ɗaa ká puo Ziɓri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm. Ɓe na, i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ í i ni.
Roo lɛ, ndeke ɗi nam sayke na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun. Ka kiɛ sùo-ɛ

ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ya, roo lɛ, ka tḭi tul ɓuru ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa ɓuru pola ɓa nzoɓ nasi ɓay fekeri na. Falɛ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun na, ɓuru sṵ fe ziŋ ni nda̰w, a ɓúru nzɔ ziŋ ni nda̰w pi.
Ɓe kḭ ze, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ ɓuru ɓay haŋa ɓuru ka-káa ɓay ha̰ nzoɓri mii, ɓa ɓeri kḭ ze, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa ɓeri a ɗaa ɓeri kaw ɓa nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay ká tul nzoɓ káw kumnunri ɓáy nzoɓ huɗeri.
Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru riw bele i ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓe mii, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-e lɛ, ɓáy faa riŋ-ɛ na nda̰w rɔɔ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ndákake buma ká tul feya̰a ɓe ziŋ ni ɓáy.»
Zaɗka Piyɛr ɗo ɓáa ɓay munu kɔɓ hɔy lɛ, Tem Law Pie ví ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓri riw bele ká i laa ɓay ɓe na.
Feke ku na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i ɓa sa̰w Ziɓ ká í se ziŋ Piyɛr na, tuku ri ɓay tul Tem Law Pie ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na,
ɓay ḭi lɛ, i laa ɓayri ká i ɓaa ɓáy nzaa ɓayri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ í písike Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii:
«Ɓaarì ká i ziŋ Tem Law Pie munu ká ɓuru Ziɓri key na wa̰a, nzoɓ ve ze a háa rì faa ká ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa tul-rì nduo mbii na ɓáy lɛ?»
Báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ Zezu *Krisi. Falɛ lɛ, i koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka káw zíŋ ri nam maa fe ndḭi rɔ.
Lɛɛ, *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓáy nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude na i laa mii, nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i ya̰a Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w.
Zaɗka Piyɛr yḭ̀i a vi Zuruzalɛm na báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i ɓa sa̰w Ziɓri na, i mbi ɓay í ɓaa ziŋ ni mii:
«Ɓo na, mù se luo nzoɓri ká ɓa Ziɓ ya mú sṵ fe ziŋ ri!»
Lɛɛ, Piyɛr tii sa̰w kḭiŋa fal feri ká kal na ɓáy nzi-ɛ lɛm lɛm a ɓaa ha ri mii:
«Ɓi na, mì ɗo puo ká Zope. A zaɗka mì ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere na báyḭi lɛ, fe tina nun ha̰ mì kɔ fe rìi gari a aa gboroŋ ká i siŋ sal ɗo tḭwke niŋ bele, uru saa nulue a ví ɓo siri ká pol-i.
Lɛɛ, nun-i hu ɗi sḭi sḭi a mí ɗo bɛ́klɛ, lɛ, mì kɔ fe hɔlri ká ɓal-ri niŋ niŋ ká tusiri key, nay ɓisuyri nda̰w, feri ká i koro siri ɓáy ɓil-ri nda̰w, rɔɔ nduyri ká i se siya nda̰w pi.
Rɔɓay, mì laa kusol nzoɓ ɓaa ha̰ mì mii, “Piyɛr, úru siya ɓo mú i mú sṵ!”
Lɛɛ, mì yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii, “Úwaa! Mbay! Fe ká Ziɓri haa sṵ́ŋake í kɔ ɓa fe ká ndaya, mase ɓa fe ḭ̌m ká mini key na, mì mbi ɓo nzaa-i ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ!”
Ndeke ɗi ba siɗike na, mì laa kusol nzoɓ ká uru saa nulue mii, “Fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ta-taŋ mii, ɓa fe kere na, kɔkɔ ká mu kɔ ɓa fe ḭ̌m.”
Feke ku na vi mini faa ɓal ba say, lɛ, i yḭ̌iŋrake riw bele ɓa nulue.
Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, wa̰rari ká say ká i pie ri saa Sezare na i ví ɗo faa hul ká mì naa ɗi na.

Lɛɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha̰ mì ɓay haŋa mì se ziŋ ri taŋ má̰y ɓay. Báyḭi lɛ, yṵ-iri ká tul-ri yie ká ì kɔ ri key na, i sú mì í se ziŋ mì mbḭw hɔy se Sezare na, a ɓúru kḭri ɓúru se ɓil hul Kɔrney ká pie ha̰ mì na.

Leɗban key na tina sa̰w ɓay feri káʼa kɔ ká ɓil hul ɓe ha̰ ɓuru laa. Leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na tḭi tul-e a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii, “Mu pie nzoɓ ha̰ ni se Zope, a vǎa nzaa Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na ha̰ ni vi.
Ɓe na, a kíɛ mù ɓayri ká ɓay haŋa mù zǐŋke pam, ɓo ɓáy nzoɓ ɓori riw bele.”
Zaɗka mì tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ha ri munu na báyḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ɗì a ví ya̰a ɓil law-ri riw bele, munu káʼa ɗì a ví ya̰a ɓil law naari ká titire na.
Lɛɛ, mì ker se tul ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa pola mii, “Za̰a na ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii, roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, mì ɗáa rì nduo ɓil Tem Law Pie.”

Munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri fe ini ɓe ká ɓa Tem Law Pie munu káʼa ha̰ naari ká náa ɗáari law naari ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu *Krisi na wa̰a, mì ɓa ve nda̰w rɔɔ, mì túŋ fe ɗáa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ŋgereŋ lɛ?»

Fal ɓay ká Piyɛr ɓaa ha ri na báyḭi lɛ, law-ri nda siri fṵɔ a í pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, ɓari ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na hɔy kara, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri faa ha ri suo kér ɓay ká tul feya̰a ɓari, ɓo í ɗo ɓáy kumnun taa tusuɛke na.»

Sewke ká i ike Etḭɛn a í tii sa̰w ɗáa nun nzoɓ mbika lawri tuɔ síe ha ri ɗuu saa Zuruzalɛm na, nzoɓ mbika lawri na zekre kḭ kpɛrkɛ kpɛrkɛ í ɗuu kpṵru i tḭi Fenisi nda̰w, tukuɗu mbii Sipir nda̰w, Antiyos nda̰w, í ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká se tul Zezu ha̰ Ziɓri huo-ri kḭ hɔy.
Roo lɛ, ká sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri na, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká puo ɓari ɗo Sipir ɓáy Sirɛ̰n na, i vi Antiyos í tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay Ɓay Kere ká se tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na nda̰w.
Ŋgɛrɛmbay sa̰m fe zuɔ ɗi ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba suo kér ɓay ɓari í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e.
Lɛɛ, soro ɓay fe ká kal na, tɔɗɔ ɓo suku nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká Zuruzalɛm ha ri naa Barnabas, í pie ni kpṵru se Antiyos.
Zaɗkaʼa tḭi ɗi a kɔ law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ziŋ ri na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa suoriya a ɓo ri riw bele ɓay haŋa ri kaw tul mbika law ɓari ká tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay na ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓaŋguɔ.
Barnabas na ɓa nzoɓ law kere ká Tem Law Pie ya̰a ɓil law-ɛ kpol kpol, a ɓa nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ nzokɗo te tul Zezu. Ɓe ze ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba zuɔ ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay í nde tul nzoɓ ha̰wri ká pola.
Falɛ ku lɛ, Barnabas na zɔl a se Tars ɓay nzáa Sol ká ɗi.

Zaɗkaʼa ziŋ ni na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i ziŋ ni se Antiyos a í kaw ɗi. Maa mbiimbam mbḭw na, ɓari siɗi bele i mbṵ kḭ ziŋ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari. I fere nzoɓri fe ŋgḭi ɓamba ká ɗi. Ká ɓil puo ká Antiyos na ze i tii sa̰w túu riŋ ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ɓa «nzoɓ Krisiri.»
Sewke ku na nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰nɛri uru saa Zuruzalɛm í vi Antiyos.

Nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Agabus uru siya a ɓaa ɓay ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie ha ri mii, kɔn luye a líe ɓo zaɗri riw bele. [Tusuɛke lɛ, kɔnke ku na, lie ɓo zaɗ ɓáy sew ká Kolod réke mbay.]
Zaɗka nzoɓ mbika lawri laa ɓayke ku báyḭi lɛ, i siŋ tul ɓay mbḭw hɔy ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ha̰ fe ká maa tul hṵrusuo-ɛ ɓay píeke ɓo í sɔ́ke yṵ ɓari ká i kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude na.
Ɓe ze ɓa fe ká i mbṵ, í ɗaa zuɔ nduo Barnabas ɓáy Sol ha ri vǎa ɗaa zuɔ nduo *ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri ká Zuruzalɛm.
Ká ɓil sewke ku na, mbay *Eroɗ tii sa̰w ɗáa nun nzoɓ mbika law ha̰nɛri tuɔ síe.
Ka ha ri i Zak yṵ Za̰a ɓáy maamii.
Zaɗkaʼa kɔ fe ɗáa ɓe na rii law Ziɓri ɓamba báyḭi lɛ, ka ha ri mgba Piyɛr nda̰w. (Ɓa *nam suoriya maapa ká i ɗaa taŋ fe hew fe na.)

Falɛ káʼa mgba Piyɛr na báyḭi lɛ, ka vǎa ɗaa ni ɓo hul sal, a ha̰ nzoɓ yṵmri ɓa niŋ niŋ kɔrɔ ni í suo kḭ ɓáy namri riw bele. Ka ker ɓay tína ni ká nun nzoɓri ká fal *nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy ɓay kúŋ ɓay ɓo tul-e.
Ɓe ze í kɔrɔ Piyɛr na ká ɓil hul sal, roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ na i ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓaŋguɔ ɓay tul-e.

Nam ká Eroɗ ker ɓay tína ni ká nun nzoɓri na, ká ɓil suŋke ku na Piyɛr ká i siŋ ni ɓáy sal lari na, na-nam ká sakra nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ niri ká siɗi na. Nzoɓ yṵmri ɗo faa hul ká kɛlɛ í kɔrɔ ni nda̰w.

Báyḭi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká nulue tḭi kpeɗere a ha̰ zaɗ hie kaɗ kaɗ ká ɓil hul sal na. Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na laŋ ni a tuma ni a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úru siya ɓa vaa!» Báyḭi lɛ, sal lariri ká i síŋke nduo-ɛri na nzuma yoroŋ zuɔ siri.

Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu siŋ sal huɔ ɓil-a, a mú nda dikɔn ɓo ɗo ɓal-a.» Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na ɗaa munu. Leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɓaa ha̰ ni na rɔɓay mii: «Mu nduo maagari ɓo ká yururu na a mú vi fal-i.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr tḭi saa hul sal a se fal-ɛ. Fe ká leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɗaa ziŋ ni na, nun-ɛ mgbuɗa ká ɗi ya ɓáy, a kɔ ɓa fe ká tina nun ha̰ ni hɔy.

I kal nzoɓ yṵm ká ɗo titire ɗɛkrɛ, rɔɓay i kal nzoɓ ndeke ɗi siɗike í tḭi faa kɔ̀kɔ dudu ká i ɗaa ɓáy lari na, lɛ, faa na mgbuɗa sùo-ɛ hɔy ɓoloŋ ká pol-ri ha ri tḭi. Zaɗka i tḭi í se faa ká se ɓa ɓil puɔ na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na pɔŋ ni ká ɗi a zɔl.

Zaɗka nun Piyɛr taŋ ká tul fe ká kal na, ka ɓaa mii: «Timbɛɗɛ key na mì kɔ ro: ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay kḭ ze pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓe ha̰ ni ví tina mì saa nduo Eroɗ, ɓáy fe ka̰ayari riw bele ká Ziɓri giyaŋ ɓay ɗáa ziŋ mì na.»
Zaɗka nun Piyɛr taŋ ká tul sùo-ɛ na, ka zɔl a se ɓa puo Mari máa Za̰a ká i ɗi ni ɓa Marki. Ɓa zaɗ ká nzoɓri mbṵ kḭ ruɔ ɓamba í ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ká ɗi.
Ka nda faa hul ká kɛlɛ, lɛ, leɗ káw mbḭw ká ɓa má̰y nzoɓ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Rod soro a se ɓay kɔ́kɔ.
Lɛɛ, ka laa kusol Piyɛr ha̰ sùo-ɛ rii ni ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri, a pɔŋ mgbúɗa faa na, a ɗuu a vǎa ɓaa ha nzoɓri mii: «Piyɛr ɗo faa hul ká kɛlɛ ɗi ku!»
Báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓala ze ɗáa mù lɛ woo?» Lɛɛ, ka geɗe a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓa sùo ɓe kḭ.» I yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Munu lɛ, ɓa wṵru ɓe zu.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr nda faa hul na ɓaŋguɔ. Zaɗka i ví mgbuɗa faa hul í kɔ ɓa ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri riw bele.

Ro, Piyɛr ura nduo-ɛ a laŋ ɓay haŋa ri pɔŋ rɔɗ nzaa, rɔɔ a kḭi fal fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa a tínake ni saa hul sal na ha ri laa. A yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì vǎa ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ Zak ɓáy yṵ naari ha ri laa.» Falɛ ku lɛ, ka tḭi a se zaɗ kḭ.
Nzaaruo sil na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ yṵmri se tul kḭ hali hali ɓay kɔ́kɔ zaɗ ká Piyɛr na tḭi ɓa ɓaɗi.

Eroɗ hɔy kara ha ri nzaara ni kpṵy í ziŋ ni ya. Falɛ káʼa vbi nzoɓ yṵmri ká i kɔrɔ Piyɛr na báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ nzoɓ yṵm ɓeri i ɓari nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na. Ro, a zɔl saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude a se ŋgɛrɛpuo Sezare ɓay káw ɗi ndḭi.

Báyḭi lɛ, law *Eroɗ na zoŋ ká tul nzoɓri ká Tir ɓáy Sido̰n. Lɛɛ, i tuɗ tul kḭ í mbṵ nzaa-ri mbḭw hɔy ɓay zíŋ ni. Falɛ ká i vǎa ziŋ Balatus ká ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ ɓil puo Mbay Eroɗ í leke ɓay ziŋ ni na báyḭi lɛ, í vǎa vbi Eroɗ ɓay haŋa ɗɛkɛkɛ ka ɗo sakra ɓari, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓáy faa puoruo ɓe rɔɔ, i zíŋke fe sṵm í sṵ ɓáy.
Nam ká Eroɗ tuu ha ri na vi báyḭi lɛ, ka nduo gari mbay ɓe a kaw tul kariŋgaw mbay a baka ri ɓay.
Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri sìi gay ɓe ɓáy nzaa-ri gɔ̌m í ɓaa mii: «Ɓa nzoɓ ze ɓaa ɓay ku ya, roo lɛ, ɓa wṵru!»
Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká nulue nda ni riɓ ɓo siri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mbay ká ɗo ɓay ɗáa ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka ɗaa ɓo tul-e ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ. Ze kayri sṵ ɓil-e ha̰ ni hu.
Ɓe nu ku ro, Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ya̰a zaɗ ɓa pola pola, ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ŋgḭi ɓa pola pola.

A Barnabas ɓáy Sol na lɛ, zaɗka peɗ ɓari ká i pie ri ɓay haŋa ri vǎa ɗaa ká Zuruzalɛm na ɔ báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í se Antiyos, a í ɗaa Za̰a ká i ɗi ni ɓa Marki na ɓo fal-ri ha̰ ni se ziŋ ri mbḭw hɔy.

Ká sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká Antiyos na, *nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri fe i kaw ɗi. Riŋ nzoɓkeri na ze ɗo key: Barnabas nda̰w, Simeo̰n, ɓe ká i ɗi ni ɓa Nizɛr nda̰w, Lusiyus, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ ká Sirɛ̰n nda̰w, Manahen, ɓe ká i hɔl ni ɓáy Mbay *Eroɗ mbḭw hɔy nda̰w, rɔɔ Sol nda̰w pi.

Nam mbḭw munu ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ɓay rúo Ŋgɛrɛmbay, a í saŋ sùo-ri í sṵ fe ya na báyḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì naa Barnabas ɓáy Sol í ɗaa ri ɗo ɓoɗ ha̰ mì ɓay tul peɗ ká mì ɗi ri ɓayke.»
Falɛ ká i saŋ sùo-ri í sṵ fe ya, a í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa nduo-ri ɓo tul Barnabas ɓáy Sol na rɔɔ, í pɔŋ ri zɔl ɓáy.
Barnabas ɓáy Sol ká Tem Law Pie pie ri mini na, i mbi faa i se ɓa Selusi ká ɗo nzaa maambii. Ká zaɗɛ ku ze, i hila ri ká ɗi ha ri se tukuɗu mbii ká Sipir.
Zaɗka i tḭi tukuɗu mbii ká Sipir na, i ɗì í se puo ká Salamin í tii sa̰w ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓil *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri. Za̰a-Marki ɗo ziŋ ri mbḭw a sɔ ri.

I ha̰ari tukuɗu mbii na riw bele, kpṵru í tḭ́ike puo ká Pafos. Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na i ziŋ nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭi mbḭw munu, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Bar-Zezu. Ka ɓa Ziɓ, a ɗaa sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.

Ka kaw lakun Sɛrziyus Polus, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ réke tul puo ká tukuɗu mbii, a ɓa nzoɓ fe kɔ́kɔ nda̰w. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓe Sɛrziyus Polus na, ka ɗi Barnabas ɓáy Sol, ɓay ḭi lɛ, kɔn láa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru sɛ ni ŋgḭi ɓamba.
Lɛɛ, nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭi ká ɓa Bar-Zezu (ká riŋ-ɛ ɓáy nzaa gɛrɛk ɓa
Báyḭi lɛ, Sol (ká i ɗi ni ɓa Pol) ká Tem Law Pie ya̰a ɓil law-ɛ kpol kpol na kɔ ni ɓa siya ɓa tiya a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii:

«Ɓo vu ŋgɛrɛtemndaya! Ɓo nzoɓ law ndaya ká mù ɓa nzoɓ úla nzoɓ, ká mú ɓa nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni fe kereri riw bele. Faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɗo sikɗa ká mù mgba mú ra̰a ɗo fi mbḭw na wa̰a, síe ha̰a rɔɔ mù pɔ́ŋ nzaa nduo fe ɗáa ɓo na lɛ?

Timbɛɗɛ key na, mu laa key! Nduo Ŋgɛrɛmbay a mgbaka mù ha̰ mù ra̰a, lɛ, mù ti kɔ́kɔ zaɗ mbǎa bole a ɗí maa fe.» Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, nun Elimas sii nduŋ ha̰ ni kɔ zaɗ ya. Ka far zaɗ far rɔɔ, a nzaara nzoɓ ɓay haŋa ni kuɔ ni ɓáy.
Zaɗka nzoɓ réke tul puo na kɔ fe ká tḭi tul Elimas na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul Zezu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe ká Pol ɓáy Barnabas fere ni se tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay na, tuku ni ha̰ ni kaw yer.
Báyḭi lɛ, Pol ɓáy bǎw seɗ ɓeri i se í vǎa kaw ɓil bawda tuo ká Pafos, í se ɓa Pɛrze ká tusiri Pamfili. Lɛɛ, Za̰a-Marki pɔŋ ri ká zaɗɛ na ku a yḭ̀i ɓa Zuruzalɛm.
Pol ɓáy Barnabas na laa lɛ, i uru ká Pɛrze na í se nun-ri ɓa Antiyos ká tusiri Pisidi. Zaɗka i tḭi ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, i se ɓil *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri ká ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ram í kaw ɗi.

Falɛ ká i kḭi ɓay ha̰nɛri ká ɗo ɓil *mbeɗe bol kusol ɓáy taa *nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɔ riw bele na, mbay hul mbṵ́ kḭri ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì yṵ ɓururi, timbɛɗɛ key na, zaɗka ì ɗo ɓáy ɓay ká ɓay ɓókoke nzoɓri lɛ, ì ɓaa.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Pol uru siya a ura nduo-ɛ ha̰ zaɗ ɗo ndiŋ rɔɔ a ɓaa mii: «Ɓaarì leɗ Izarayɛlri, ɓáy ɓaarì ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ì laa ɓay ɓi key na ɓáy kere!

Ŋgɛrɛwṵru leɗ Izarayɛlri key na nan bulu naari ɓa nzoɓ taa ɓeri. Ɓáy ɗol ɓari ká i ɗǒke tusiri Eziɓte na, ka ɗaa ha ri ŋgḭi ɓa pola pola, rɔɓay, ɓáy nduo hoɗo ɓe na, ka tǐnake ri ɓáy hṵrusuo-ɛ saa ɗi.
Maa mbiimbam síŋ niŋ na, ka iki law-ɛ ká tul-ri a kɔ̌rɔke ri ká ɓil law kɔr.
Falɛ ku rɔɔ, a ha̰ leɗ Izarayɛlri i sa̰w nzoɓri ká ɓa tɔnɔ say ká i kaw tusiri *Kanaa na, a pɔŋ zaɗɛ ku na ha ri ɓa tusiri ɓari.
Fekeri riw bele ku na, bole ɗi maa mbiimbam isɔɗ niŋ ɓáy síŋ ndeɓe munu. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka ha̰ nzoɓ ɗáa ɓayri kaw tul-ri kpṵru tḭi ɓil sewke ká Samiyɛl ɓáke nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
«Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ Izarayɛlri na i vbi mbay ɓay haŋa ni ka káw tul-ri. Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri Sawul ká ɓa vu Kis ká sa̰w ka̰ni ɓe ɓa Bezamɛ ha̰ ni re tul-ri maa mbiimbam síŋ niŋ.

Rɔɓay, falɛ káʼa tuŋ Sawul ŋgereŋ na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a naa *Daviɗ ɓa mbay a ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓe mii: “Mì kɔ Daviɗ, vu Zese ɓa wa̰ra law-i. Ɓe ze, a ɗáa feri riw bele ká mì hii na ha̰ ni ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ.”
Nzoɓ mbḭw ká sa̰w Daviɗ na ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ni kaw ɓa Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓ ɓay tul leɗ Izarayɛlri munu káʼa waa na. Ɓe ze ɓa Zezu.
Pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa Zezu vi na, Za̰a Batis ka-káa ɓay haŋa leɗ Izarayɛlri riw bele i suo kér ɓay ɓari ɓo, í ha ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii.

Zaɗka Za̰a ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa mii: “Ɓaarì na wa̰a ì ɓaa mii, mì ɓa ve lɛ? Mì ɓa nzoɓ ká ì giyaŋ ni na ya. Roo lɛ, ì láa mì key: nzoɓ káʼa ví fal-i vuku na, sal dikɔn ká ɓal-ɛ hɔy kara mì maa ɓay hína ya.”
«Yṵ-iri, ɓaarì ká ì ɓa vu bulu *Abaraham, ɓáy ɓaarì ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ɓa naari kḭ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie ɓáy ɓay pam key na ha̰ naari.

Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓri ká Zuruzalɛm ɓáy mbay ɓari na, Zezu ɓa ve lɛ na i kɔ ya. Ɓay ká i kḭi se tul-e ká ɓil mbeɗe nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ramri riw bele na kara, i laa sa̰w ɓayke taŋ ya. Roo lɛ, ɓáy faa ɓay huɗ ká i ɗaa ɓo tul Zezu na ha̰ ɓay ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa se tul-e na, ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ.
Ze i ziŋ ka̰aya mbḭw ká ɓay ɗáake ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-e ya na hɔy kara, i vbi Pilaɗ ɓay haŋa ni pɔŋ faa ha ri i ni.
Falɛ ká Zezu ɗaa feri riw bele ɔ, munu ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru se tul-e na, i ɗira ni saa tul puu say huɗ í vǎa ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil luɔ huɗ.
Roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun.

Lɛɛ, ɓil namri ká ŋgḭi maa fe ká fal tḭ́i ɓe saa luɔ huɗ na, Zezu tḭi tul ɓari ká i su ni saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele kpṵru tḭi Zuruzalɛm na. Ɓari na, i ɓa nzoɓ nasi ɓay ɓe ɓay ɓáa ɓay ká se tul-e na ha̰ leɗ Izarayɛlri.
«Ɓuru kara, ɓuru vi ka-káa Ɓay Kere key na ha rì kɔ mii: fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ziŋ bulu naari pola lew hɔy ɓay ɗáa na,
ka ɗaa timbɛɗɛ ɓay tul naari ká náa ɓári vu ɓari, a tǐnake Zezu saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓay kumnun munu káʼa ɓaa ɗo ɓil sim ndeke ɗi siɗike ká ɓil Mbeɗe Simri na mii:
“Ɓo na mù ɓa Vu-i;
úru saa vuri key na mì ɓa Bǎa-ka
«Rɔɓay, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɓayke pola lew hɔy mii, ɓeri tína ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ naysuo-ɛ ka púŋ mbuɗuk mbuɗuk ya. Ka ɓaa mii:
“Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ!
Mì sá̰m fe sa̰mi kere ɓi ká taŋ kaɗ kaɗ
káʼa ɗoko wṵ̌m na zuɔ tul rì,
munu ká mì waa ziŋ Daviɗ na
Sa̰wke mini ze, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ Daviɗ ɓaa ɓayke ɗo zaɗ kḭ rɔɓay mii:
“Mù ti pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ naysuo nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓo na,
puŋ mbuɗuk mbuɗuk ya
Ɓe Daviɗ na, zaɗkaʼa kaw ɓáy kumnun ɓáy na, ka ɗaa peɗ ká law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii na ha̰ ni ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ; falɛ ku lɛ, ka ví hu ha ri mbi ni í voro ni ɗo lakun bul-eri ha̰ naysuo-ɛ puŋ mbuɗuk mbuɗuk.
Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ na, naysuo-ɛ puŋ mbuɗuk ya.

«Yṵ-iri, ì kɔ ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ! Taambɔl Zezu na ze ɓuru ka-káa ɓay ká se tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru káʼa ndáka buma ká tul feya̰a ɓaarì ziŋ rì. Taambɔl Zezu na, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-e lɛ, feya̰a ɓeri riw bele na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a náa ká tul-e ɓa fal. Feke ku na, *bol kusol *Moyze maa ɓay ɗáa ya.
Munu zu lɛ, ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay haŋa fe ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɓayke na, ka tḭi tul-rì ya. I ɓaa mii:

“Ɓaarì nzoɓ síɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri na, ì káw yer a í ɓíɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe ká mì ɗaa ká ɓil sewke ká ì kaw ɓáy kumnun na, ì ti ɗáa law-rì ɓo ɗi ya. Ze i ha ri kɔ sa̰w ɓayke na hɔy kara, ì ti ya̰aŋa ya
Zaɗka Pol ɓáy Barnabas tḭi saa zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri koɗ ri ɓay haŋa ri yḭ̀i í vi ɓáy nam mgbaka ta̰ram taa fal na ɓay ɓáa ɓay se tul ɓay taa mbḭwke na ku ɓáy ha ri laa.

Fal mbṵ́ kḭ ká nzoɓri zekre kḭ na báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í fɛrɛ sùo-ri í ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, i ŋgḭi ɓamba se fal Pol ɓáy Barnabas. Lɛɛ, Pol ɓáy Barnabas na ɓo ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ziŋ ri na, í rḭi tul-e ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara.
Ká ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ram taa kḭ na, ruɔ nzoɓri ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo riw bele, i ví mbṵ kḭ ɓay láa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
Zaɗka Ziɓri kɔ ruɔ nzoɓri na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa sere ziŋ Pol í tuŋ ɓay ɓe ŋgereŋ í raɗ ni, a í mgba nasi zuɔ tul-e.

Báyḭi lɛ, Pol ɓáy Barnabas i ɓaa ɓay ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ ha ri mii: «Ɓa ɓaarì kḭ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii ɓay haŋa rì laa ɓay ɓe pola. Roo lɛ, ì tuŋ ɓayke ŋgereŋ, a í kɔ sùo-rì mii, ì maa ɓay zíŋ kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na ya. Munu zu lɛ, nda-ndaɗ! Timbɛɗɛ key na, ɓuru fɛ́rɛ sùo ɓuru ɓa luo nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ro.
Tusuɛke lɛ, fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi ha̰ ɓuru na ze ɗo key:
“Mì ɗáa mù kaw ɓa zaɗ taŋa ká sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele,
ɓay haŋa ɓo mu se mú ka-káa ɓay pam na
kpṵru mú tḭ́ike gbṵ tusiri na ha̰ nzoɓri laa

Zaɗka nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i laa ɓayke munu báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa suoriya a í pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay tul ɓay ɓe. Ɓari riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nan ri pola ɗo ɓay zíŋ kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na, i vi ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri.
Ɓe ku rɔɔ, Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay yǎ̰ake zaɗ kpol kpol ká ɓil tusiri ɓari riw bele.
Roo lɛ, Ziɓri na, i ɗaa ɓay zuɔ ɓil law má̰y feziŋari ká i ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ puori ha ri suru tigba̰a nzoɓri ha ri ɗaa nun Pol ɓáy Barnabas tuɔ síe, ɓo i níike ri ká tusiri ɓari na.
Ɓe ze, Pol ɓáy Barnabas na, i nda sṵm siri ká ɓal-ri kuɓ kuɓ zuɔ tul-ri, í zɔl a í se ɓa Ikoniyum.
Roo lɛ, ɓari nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i tɔ̀ŋ na, suoriya ɓáy Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ri.

Zaɗka Pol ɓáy Barnabas i tḭi Ikoniyum na báyḭi lɛ, i kal i se *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri munu ká i ɗaa ɓaŋguɔ. Ɓay ɓari ká i ɓaa na yḭŋ ɓamba tasiri ha̰ Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri na, i vi ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri.
Roo lɛ, Ziɓri ká i hii ɓay ɗáa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu ya na, i suru tigba̰a nzoɓ ha̰wri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ha ri ker ɓay ndaya se tul Pol ɓáy Barnabas.

Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, Pol ɓáy Barnabas kaw Ikoniyum bole ɗi ɗi. Ɓari na, ɓay law-ri ká i ɗaa ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ na, i káake káa Ɓay Kere Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ. Ŋgɛrɛmbay kḭ sùo-ɛ ɗo fal-ri a sɔ ri, ha̰ nzoɓri kɔ ɓay ká i ka-káake se tul law kere ɓe káʼa mgba ziŋ ri na ɓa tusuɛ ɓay, a ha ri hṵrusuo ɗáa fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ na.
Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke ku na i te ɓil kḭ. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri i ɓa nzoɓ taa Ziɓri, a nzoɓ ha̰wri laa lɛ, i ɓa nzoɓ taa *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri.
Ro, Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya, ɓáy mbay ɓari mbṵ nzaa-ri mbḭw hɔy ɓay ɗáa sɛkɛ ziŋ Pol ɓáy Barnabas í hii ɓay vbúku ri ɓáy tisawri.
Lɛɛ, zaɗka Pol ɓáy Barnabas laa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗuu ɓa puo ká Listere nda̰w, Dɛrbe nda̰w ɓáy vu puo ha̰wri ká kiri ri ká tusiri Likayoni nda̰w pi.
Ká ɓil puokeri ku na, i ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká ɗi ha̰ nzoɓri laa.
Ɓil puo ká Listere na, leɗban mbḭw munu ká ɓal-ɛ hu wǔɔ ká i mboŋke ni saa wṵru ha̰ ni se-seɗ ya na kaw ɗi.
Lɛɛ, ka laa ɓay ká Pol ɗo ɓáa. Báyḭi lɛ, Pol kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa nun-ɛ ɗeke, lɛ, ka kɔ law-ɛ káʼa ɗaa ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay na maa haŋa sùo-ɛ ka vaa.
Ro, a ɓaa ɓay ha̰ ni ɓáy bawda kusol-e mii: «Úru siya mú ɗo sikɗa!» Lɛɛ, leɗban na uru siya vaɗ a se-seɗ.
Ruɔ nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ í kɔ fe ká Pol ɗaa na báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ɓay ɓeleŋ ɓáy nzaa Likayoni mii: «Ɓe ni key na, ɓa wṵruri ro ze i fɛrɛ sùo-ri ɓa nzoɓri í ɗì í vi luo naari key!»
Ɓe ze, í tǔuke riŋ-ri ɓa riŋ wṵru ɓari. I ɗi Barnabas ɓa Zus, a Pol laa lɛ, i ɗi ni ɓa Ɛrmɛs, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɓa nzoɓ mbika tul ɓay.

Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ *fe poy wṵru ɓari Zus, ká hul ɓe ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy nzaa ŋgɛrɛpuo deɓ na, se a vǎa fa̰a bawda bǎa ndayri ká i ɗew ri ɓáy fukri puuri ɗo sol-ri, rɔɔ a víkeri zaɗ ɗol Pol ɓáy Barnabas, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓe ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri na, i hii ɓay ika ndayri ɓay púoke fe ha̰ Pol ɓáy Barnabas ɓa wṵru ɓari.
Zaɗka Barnabas ɓáy Pol ká i ɓa *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na, i kɔ munu báyḭi lɛ, kér ɓay i ri ɓa huɗ ha ri gɔɗɔ gari ɓari tir tir, í takra í rìi sakra ruɔ nzoɓri

í ɓaa ɓay ɓeleŋ ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì nzoɓri woo! Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ, ì ɗaa fe mini key lɛ? Ɓuru na, ɓuru ɓa nzoɓ munu ká ɓari na nda̰w. Ɓay Kere ká ɓuru ví ka-káake ha rì na, ɓuru ɓóke rì ɓay haŋa rì ala wṵru ɓari key ká ì puo gɔr hɔy na, í fɛrɛ sùo-ri ɓa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Káw Ɓáy Kumnun ká ɗaa tumbam nda̰w, tusiri nda̰w, maambiiri nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy feri riw bele ká ɗo ɓil-e na.
Pola lew na, ka pɔŋ faa ha̰ sa̰w puo nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ɗaa fe munu ká law-ri hii.

Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kiɛ fe kereri ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara ha̰ nzoɓri kɔ mii, ɓeri ɗo key. Ka ha̰ mbam tɔ ha rì nda̰w, a ha rì ziŋ fe pay ɓáy fewke fewke riw bele nda̰w, a ha̰ fe sṵm maa rì siɓ siɓ nda̰w, a ha̰ suoriya mbaa ɓil law-rì gba̰y gba̰y nda̰w pi.»
Ze nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓaa munu hɔy kara, ŋgɔŋ ziŋ ri ɓamba ɓay haŋa nzoɓri pɔŋ ɗáa fe poy ha ri.

Báyḭi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy Ziɓri ká i uru saa Antiyos ká tusiri Pisidi ɓáy Ikoniyum na, i tḭi Listere í ɗaa ɓay zuɔ ɓil law ruɔ nzoɓ puokeri ku na ha ri se fal-ri í vbuku Pol ɓáy tisawri ɓay ika ni. Falɛ ku rɔɔ, í kuɔ ni saa ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na í ɗaa ni ɓo nzaa zaɗ í ker mii ka hu-hu.
Roo lɛ, zaɗka nzoɓ mbika lawri kiri tul-e gbǔku na, ka uru siya a se ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na ɓa kḭ. Nzaaruoke na báyḭi lɛ, ɓe ɓáy Barnabas na i zɔl mbḭw hɔy i se puo ká Dɛrbe.

Pol ɓáy Barnabas na i ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká ɓil puo ká Dɛrbe, lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ya̰a ɓayke na, í vi ɓa leɗ nduoɓal Zezu. Falɛ ku lɛ, *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na, i yḭ̀i í se Listere nda̰w, Ikoniyum nda̰w, rɔɔ í se Antiyos ká tusiri Pisidi nda̰w.

Nzoɓ mbika lawri ká puokeri ku na, Pol ɓáy Barnabas ɗaa wa̰ra ɓo ɓil law-ri, í ɓo ri ɓay haŋa ri kaw tul mbika law ɓari ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ, í ɓaa ha ri mii: «Náa kɔ́kɔri sɛkɛ feri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ pola nda̰w rɔɔ, náa séri ɓil *puoruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓáy.»

Zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭri mbḭw mbḭw riw bele ká nzoɓ mbika lawri mbṵ tul kḭ ká ɗi na, Pol ɓáy Barnabas nan nzoɓri ɓay haŋa ri ɓa *ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri. Falɛ ká i saŋ sùo-ri í sṵ fe ya í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ɓay tul-ri na, i pɔŋ ri zuɔ ɓil nduo Ŋgɛrɛmbay, nzoɓ ká i ɗaa law-ri zuɔ tul-e na.
Falɛ ku rɔɔ, i kal ɓáy tusiri Pisidi í tḭi kuɗu zaɗ ká Pamfili.
Ká ɓil kuɗu zaɗke ku na, i ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká Pɛrze, rɔɔ í se Atali ká ɗo nzaa maambii na ɓáy.

Ká zaɗɛ ku na, i rìi í kaw ɓil bawda tuo ɓay yḭ́i ɓa Antiyos ká Siri. Ɓa ŋgɛrɛpuo ká nzoɓ mbika lawri pie ri saa ɗi í pɔŋ ri zuɔ ɓil law kere Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay tul peɗ ká i vǎa ɗaa ha̰ ni ɔ timbɛɗɛ key na.

Zaɗka i tḭi Antiyos na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗi nzoɓ mbika lawri ha ri ví mbṵ kḭ, í kḭi fal feri riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɓáy faa ɓari na ha ri laa. Kakalike lɛ, faa ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mgbuɗa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya, ká í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu nda̰w na, i kḭi falɛ ha ri laa.
Pol ɓáy Barnabas kaw ziŋ nzoɓ mbika lawri na bole ɗi maa fe.

Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i uru saa Zude í vi Antiyos na, i tii sa̰w fére yṵ ɓari fe í ɓaa ha ri mii: «Zaɗka ì kuŋ ŋgori ɓaarì munu ká *bol kusol *Moyze fere nzoɓri na ya lɛ, ì ti zíŋ pam na ya.»

Ɓay ɓari ká i ɓaa na, Pol ɓáy Barnabas ma̰y ziŋ ri kpṵru í ndɔrke kḭ ɓa pola ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri mbṵ nzaa-ri ɓay haŋa Pol ɓáy Barnabas ɓáy nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari na, i úru i se Zuruzalɛm luo *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓáy *ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri ɓo, í léke ɓayke.

Falɛ ká nzoɓ mbika lawri su ri ɗo faa í waɗa ri na báyḭi lɛ, ɓari na i se nun-ri ɓa pola í kál ɓáy Fenisi, Samari nda̰w, í kḭ́ike fal feri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na fɛ̌rɛke sùo-ri ɓa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ɓayke ku na mbi bawda suoriya ha̰ yṵ ɓari riw bele.

Zaɗka i tḭi Zuruzalɛm na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ nda̰w, nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri nda̰w, rɔɔ ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri nda̰w na, i mgba ri ɓa sùo-ri ɓáy kere. Lɛɛ, Pol ɓáy Barnabas kḭi fal feri riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɓáy faa ɓari na ha ri laa.

Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa *Fariziri ká i vi ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri na, i uru siya í ɓaa ha ri mii, ɗo nun haŋa nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i kuŋ ŋgori ɓari nda̰w, a í ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul bol kusol Moyze nda̰w pi.
Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri mbṵ tul kḭ ɓay bɛ́klɛ sa̰w ɓayke na ɓay kɔ́kɔ.

Fal ɓay ká i ma̰y bole ɗi ɓamba ká sakra kḭ na báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr uru siya a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì yṵ-iri, ì kɔ nda̰w mii, bole ɗi ɓamba ro, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru náa mì ká sakra ɓaarì ɓay haŋa mì ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i laa í ɗáake law-ri ɓo tul Zezu.
Rɔɓay, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́kɔ ɓil law nzoɓ na, ha̰ Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, faa mbḭw munu káʼa ha̰ ni mbaa ɓil law naari key na nda̰w.
Ɓe ze, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ká sakra ɓari ɓáy naari na, náa nun kḭ tiya. Ka wàa feya̰a ɓari ha̰ law-ri *taŋ kaɗ kaɗ, ɓay tul law-ri ká i ɗaa ɓo tul Zezu.

Munu ku waa, ɗaa mina rɔɔ timbɛɗɛ key na ì lie Ŋgɛrɛwṵru í hii ɓay ɗáa soɓa ká hii ɓamba mini key ɓo tul nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na lɛ? Ɓa soɓa ká mba tul bulu naari nda̰w, tul naari nda̰w pi.
Náa kɔ́ri ta-taŋ, ɓa law kere Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ká ha̰ ze náa zǐŋkeri pam, faa mbḭw munu ká ɓari na nda̰w.»

Nzoɓri riw bele ká i mbṵ kḭ na i kaw ndiŋ. Lɛɛ, i te suku-ri ɓay láa ɓay ká Pol ɓáy Barnabas ɓaa ha ri se tul fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɓáy faa ɓari ká sakra nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na.
Zaɗka i ɓaa ɓay na ɔ riw bele báyḭi lɛ, Zak mbi ɓay a ɓaa mii: «Yṵ-iri, ì te suku-rì í laa ɓay ɓi key rɔ!
Simo̰n Piyɛr na kḭi fal faa ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kɔ́ke kɔ́m ɓa tul sa̰w nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ɓáy tiikake na, ɓay nán nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká ɓil-e ɓay haŋa ri ɓa nzoɓ taa ɓeri.
Lɛɛ, ɓay ká Simo̰n Piyɛr ɓaa na, ɗo faa mbḭw munu ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ɓáy faa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzi-ɛ pola lew mii:
“Falɛ ku lɛ, mì yḭ́i ɓay ɗáa hul *Daviɗ ká haw zuɔ siri na
ɗo zaɗɛ ɓa kḭ.
Zaɗ ɓeri ká ɓiɛ na mì léke ɗo siya.
Mì léke ni ɗo sikɗa ɓáy zaɗɛ,
ɓay haŋa nzoɓri riw bele ká i tɔ̀ŋ fal na,
i nzáake fal-i;
ɓay haŋa sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele ká mì ɗi ri ɓa nzoɓ taa ɓi na,
i nzáa mì, ɓi ká mì ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
Ɓe ze ɓa ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay, ɓe káʼa ha̰ nzoɓri kɔ fe niri key ɓa ɗḭ̌ɛ lew hɔy na ɓaa
«Sa̰wke mini ze, mì ker mii, nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í fɛrɛ sùo-ri ɓa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, nzoɓ ka yɔklɔ ri faake ya.

Roo lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa náa ɗáari mbeɗe ɓo, náa vbíkeri ri ɓay haŋa ri mgba sùo-ri ká tul náyri ká nzoɓri púoke fe ha̰ wṵru ɓari nda̰w, ká tul ɗáa nun pie nda̰w, ká tul sṵŋa nayri ká i piri sol-ri ká sím ndiŋ ɓa ɓaɗi na nda̰w pi.

Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓa ɗḭ̌ɛ lew ɓáy sa̰w bulu nzoɓri kpṵru tḭi vuri key na, i ka-káa bol kusol Moyze ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo mbḭw mbḭw riw bele. A nam mgbaka ta̰ramri riw bele na, Ziɓri kḭi bol kusolke ku na ká *hul mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari.»

Báyḭi lɛ, *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri, ɓáy *ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri, rɔɔ ɓáy ɓari nzoɓ mbika law ha̰wri riw bele na, i mbi nzaa-ri mbḭw hɔy ɓay nan nzoɓri ká sakra ɓari ha ri se ziŋ Pol ɓáy Barnabas se Antiyos. Lɛɛ, i naa Zud (ká i ɗi ni ɓa Barsabas) ɓáy Silas ɓari siɗi bele ká nzoɓ mbika lawri hḭɛ ri í ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul-ri na.
I ɗaa mbeɗe nduo nduo-ri ɓay haŋa ri séke. Ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗeke na ze ɗo key:

«Ɓuru nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri ká ɓuru ɓa yṵ ɓaarì na, ɓuru ɗaa mbeɗe ni key na ha rì, ɓaarì yṵ ɓururi ká ì ɓa sa̰w Ziɓ ya ká ì kaw Antiyos nda̰w, Siri nda̰w, rɔɔ Silisi nda̰w na, ɓuru hii soko ha rì.
Ɓuru laa mii, yṵ ɓuru ha̰nɛri ká i uru saa luo ɓuru key, ká ɓuru mbi nzaa ɓuru munu ha ri ya na, i se luo-rì í vǎa fɛrɛ kér ɓay ɓaarì ɓáy faa ɓay ɓari, í yɔ́klɔke rì.
Sa̰wke mini ze, ɓuru mbi nzaa ɓuru mbḭw hɔy, ɓúru nan nzoɓri ká sakra ɓuru key ɓay haŋa ri se ziŋ nzoɓ taa ɓururi ká ɓa Barnabas ɓáy Pol na ha ri se luo-rì.
Pol ɓáy Barnabas na, i ɓa nzoɓri ká i pɔŋ sùo-ri ha̰ huɗ ɓay tul riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu *Krisi.
Ɓe ze, ɓuru pie Zud ɓáy Silas se luo-rì. Ɓari na, ì ɓáa ɓayke ɓáy nzaa-ri munu ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key na ha rì laa nda̰w.
Tusuɛke lɛ, Tem Law Pie nda̰w, ɓuru nda̰w na, ɓuru mbi nzaa ɓuru ɓay haŋa rì soɓa ká hii ɓamba na ya. Roo lɛ, feri ká ɗo nun haŋa rì ɗaa na ze ɗo key:

ì mgba sùo-rì ká tul náyri ká i púoke fe ha̰ wṵru ɓari nda̰w, ká tul ɗáa nun pie nda̰w, ká tul sṵŋa nayri ká i piri sol-ri ká sím ndiŋ ɓa ɓaɗi na nda̰w pi. Zaɗka ì mgba sùo-rì ɓay tul fe niri key na lɛ, ì káw ɓáy kere. Ɓuru pɔŋ rì zuɔ ɓil nduo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ro.»

Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zuruzalɛm na, i pɔŋ faa ha̰ Pol ɓáy Barnabas ɓáy nzoɓ nzaapeɗri ká i nan ri na ha ri se ɓa Antiyos. Zaɗka i tḭi ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, i mbṵ nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele í ha ri mbeɗe ká i píeke ri na.
Zaɗka i kḭi mbeɗeke a í laa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa suoriya ɓay tul wa̰ra káʼa ɗaa ɓo ɓil law-ri.
Lɛɛ, Zud ɓáy Silas ká i ɓa *nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru sùo-ri na, i ɓo yṵ ɓari ŋgḭi ɓamba, í gɔl ri ha ri ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law ɓari.
Falɛ ká i kaw ziŋ ri bole ɗi maa fe na báyḭi lɛ, yṵ ɓari ká Antiyos na pɔŋ ri ha ri yḭ̀i í se Zuruzalɛm ɓáy ɗɛkɛkɛ, í vǎa ziŋ nzoɓri ká i pie ri na.
[Roo lɛ, Silas kuŋ sùo-ɛ a kaw fal ká Antiyos kɔɓ.]
Ɓe nu ku lɛ, Pol ɓáy Barnabas kaw Antiyos. Ɓari ɓáy nzoɓ ha̰wri ŋgḭi ɓamba i fere nzoɓri fe í ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay ha ri.
Bole ɗi maa fe na báyḭi lɛ, Pol ɓaa ha̰ Barnabas mii: «Naa se náa vǎa kɔ yṵ naari ká tul puo tul puo ká náa káari káa Ɓay Kere Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɗi pola na náa kɔ wa̰a, i kaw mina zu lɛ?»
Lɛɛ, Barnabas hii ɗo ɗi, a hii ɓay haŋa Za̰a ká i ɗi ni ɓa Marki na se ziŋ ri.
Roo lɛ, Pol kɔ rii ni ya, a hii ɓay haŋa ni se ziŋ ri ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, varu ɓari ká i se pola na ka pɔŋ ri ká Pamfili, a zɔl taŋ ɔ́rɔ ɓie peɗ na ziŋ ri.
Báyḭi lɛ, i ndɔr kḭ ɓáy ɓayke na ku kpṵru í wǎlke kḭ ha̰ nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, mbi faa seɗ ɓe a se. Barnabas mgba Marki uu gar-ɛ í hil bawda tuo í se ɓa tukuɗu mbii Sipir.
A Pol laa lɛ, mgba Silas uu gar-ɛ. Falɛ ká nzoɓ mbika lawri pɔŋ ri zuɔ ɓil law kere Ŋgɛrɛmbay na báyḭi lɛ, i zɔl
í se ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ ká tusiri Siri nda̰w, Silisi nda̰w, í gɔl nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ɓáy zaɗri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ na ha ri ŋgɔŋ ká tul mbika law ɓari.
Falɛ ku lɛ, Pol uru a se Dɛrbe, rɔɔ a kal a se Listere ɓáy. Nzoɓ mbika law mbḭw munu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Timote kaw ɗi. Mi-ɛ ɓa Ziɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul Zezu, a bi-ɛ laa lɛ, ɓa Gɛrɛk.
Yṵ-ɛri ká ɓil *Krisi ká i kaw Listere ɓáy Ikoniyum na, i ɓaa ɓay ɓe ɓáy kere.
Pol hii ɓay haŋa ni ka se varu na ziŋ ni. Ɓe ze, a sùu ni ha ri vǎa kuŋ ŋgori ɓe, ɓa fe sa̰w ɓari Ziɓri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ziɓri ká tusirike ku na, i kɔ riw bele mii, bi-ɛ ɓa Gɛrɛk.

Báyḭi lɛ, i se nun-ri ɓa pola. Ɓil puori ká i kal ɗi na, i mbṵ nzoɓ mbika lawri í ɓaa ɓay feri ká *nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓáy *ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri mbi nzaa-ri ká ɗi ká Zuruzalɛm na ha ri laa, a í ɓo ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗo tul ɓay ká i mbi nzaa-ri ká ɗi na.
Ɓe nu ku ro ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ɓáy zaɗri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ na, i ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law ɓari, a í ŋgḭ̌ike nam ɓáy nam ɓa pola pola.
Pol ɓáy Silas i kal ɓáy tusiri Firizi ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galasi munu hɔy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ha̰ faa ká ɓay haŋa ri se ka-káa Ɓay Kere Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi ya.
Zaɗka i vi ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy tusiri Misi na báyḭi lɛ, i nzaa faa ɓay séke tusiri Bitini, roo lɛ, Tem taa Zezu pɔŋ faa ha ri ya na rɔɓay.
Ze í saka ɓáy tusiri Misi í kal i se Toras ká ɓa puo ká ɗo nzaa maambii.
Ká ɓil puoke ku na, fe tina nun ha̰ Pol ɓa suŋ. Ka kɔ nzoɓ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n ɗo pol-e a koɗ ni mii: «Mu tuo mbii mú vi Maseduwa̰n key ɓo, mú sɔ ɓuru!»

Fal fe ká tina nun ha̰ Pol na, zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, ɓuru nzaa faa ɓay úru ɓúru se kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n na, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓuru kɔ ta-taŋ mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ɗi ɓuru ɓay haŋa ɓuru vǎa ka-káa Ɓay Kere na ha̰ nzoɓri ká ɗi.
Úru ɓuru saa Toras na, ɓuru kaw ɓil bawda tuo, ɓúru se ndoy maa tukuɗu mbii ká Somotaras. Nzaaruoke na, ɓuru tḭi Neyapoli.
Úru saa zaɗ nu ku lɛ, ɓuru se Filiɓ ká ɓa puo ká ɗo titire zaɗ ká ɓil kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n. Puoke ku na, nzoɓri ká ŋgɛrɛpuo Rɔm ze i leke í kaw ɗi. Ɓuru ɗaa nam maa fe ndḭi ká ɗi.

Zaɗka *nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri na vi báyḭi lɛ, ɓuru tḭi saa puoke na, ɓúru se nzaa nduo mbii, ɓúru ker ɓúru ɓaa mii, kɔ ya lɛ, ɓuru zíŋ zaɗ ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere Ziɓri ká ɗi. Zaɗka ɓuru tḭi ɗi na, ɓuru kaw siri ziŋ má̰yri ká i mbṵ kḭ ká ɗi a ɓúru ɓaa ɓay ha ri.

Lɛɛ, má̰y mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku riŋ-ɛ ɓa Lidi; ɓa má̰y ká ɗaɓ gari kere ká ɓa sḭ́ɛ hola hola, a uru saa ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Tiyatir, a ɓa má̰y ká ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ɓe na, ka laa ɓay ɓuru, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay mgbuɗa ɓil law-ɛ ha̰ ni te suk-e kie a ya̰a ɓay ká Pol ɓaa na.

Báyḭi lɛ, ka ha̰ ɓuru ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii ɓáy nzoɓ ɓil puo ɓeri riw bele. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka ɗi ɓuru a ɓaa mii: «Zaɗka ì kɔ mì ɓa nzoɓ ká mì zuɔ ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓa tusuɛ lɛ, ì vi puo ɓi í káw ɗi.» Ro, a koɗ ɓuru kpṵru, ha̰ ɓuru hii ɗo ɗi ha̰ ni.

Nam mbḭw munu ká ɓuru se ɓa zaɗ ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere na, leɗ má̰y tikɗi mbḭw, ɓa leɗ káw ká wṵru mbuma ɗo tul-e, dar ɓuru gbukru ká faa. Ɓe na, ka ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́kɔ fe ha̰ nzoɓri. Ɓáy faa fe kɔ́kɔ ɓe na, bǎa kaw ɓeri zǐŋke lari wuruk wuruk.
Ze, a tii sa̰w séke fal ɓuru Polri, a guu fe ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ a ɓaa mii: «Nzoɓri key na, i ɓa leɗ peɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue siya! I ka-káa í kǐɛke rì faa ká ɓay haŋa rì zǐŋke pam!»

Ka ɗaa munu munu namri maa fe, kpṵru ha̰ fe gúu ɓe na kal law Pol gbereŋ ha̰ ni fɛrɛ nun-ɛ ɓa luo leɗ má̰y tikɗi na, a ɓaa ɓay ziŋ wṵru mbuma na mii: «Ɓáy riŋ Zezu *Krisi, mì mbi nzaa-i ha̰ mù: tḭi ká tul-e!» Lɛɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy, wṵru mbuma na tḭi ká tul leɗ má̰y tikɗi na.
Zaɗka bǎa káw ɓeri kɔ ká ɓari ti zíŋ lari ɓáy faa ɓe na mbǎa báyḭi lɛ, i mgba Pol ɓáy Silas, a í kuɔ ri ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri, í séke ri pol dɔma̰y kúŋ sal ɓayri.
I séke ri pol nzoɓ réke tul puori í ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ niri key na, i zukri kér ɓay nzoɓri ká puo naari key ɗo maŋ! Ɓari na i ɓa Ziɓri
a í fere nzoɓri fe sa̰w puo kḭ ká naari Rɔmri náa ɗori ɓáy faa ká ɓay ya̰aŋa ya nda̰w, ɓay ɗáa ya nda̰w pi.»
Ro, ruɔ nzoɓri ká i ɗo ɗi na, i uru ɓáy ɓay giŋgiŋ ɓay ɗáa fe ziŋ ri. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ réke tul puori na mgba ri, í gɔɗɔ gari ɓari ká sùo-ri tir tir a í mbi nzaa-ri ɓay haŋa ri ndaka ri ɓáy ndoy.
Fal ndam ká i nda ri kpṵru maa huɗ na báyḭi lɛ, i vǎa ɗaa ri zuɔ hul sal a í mbi nzaa ha̰ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na kɔrɔ ri kɛkɛkɛ.
Zaɗka nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na kɔ ká i mbi nzaa ha̰ ni na báyḭi lɛ, ka ha ri rìi í se ɓil hul sal ká nziiya a vǎa ɗaa foɗ zuɔ ɓal-ri.
Nzaa zaɗ buo ɗiŋ na báyḭi lɛ, Pol ɓáy Silas i ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere a í ɗi sim í písike Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, lɛ, bǎw nam hul sal ɓari na laa kusol-ri ká mgba na.
Zaɗɛ ku hɔy, tusiri laŋ yik yik tḭi tigba̰a hul sal na, ha̰ faa hulri riw bele mgbuɗa ɗo hɔy baŋtaŋ baŋtaŋ. Salri ká i síŋke nzoɓ naaŋa hul salri na kara hina riw bele basak zuɔ siri.

Zaɗka nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na tuma saa nam a kɔ faa hul salri ká ɗo hɔy baŋtaŋ baŋtaŋ na báyḭi lɛ, ka naa maamii ɓe saa ŋgole ɓay ikake sùo-ɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ker mii, nzoɓ naaŋa hul salri na, i tḭi í zekre kḭ kaɗ kaɗ riw bele ro.
Ro, Pol ɗi ni ɓáy bawda kusol-e a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu ɓíɛ sùo-ɔ ya! Ɓuru ɗo key riw bele ɓáy!»
Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na vbi huu a takra a séke ɓil hul sal na, lɛ, sùo-ɛ tɔ ɗɛk ɗɛk riw bele a vǎa hǔkuke pol Pol ɓáy Silas.
Falɛ lɛ, ka tina ri a vbi ri ɓay mii: «Mbay ɓiri woo! Fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mì ɗáa ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru yǎ̰ake mì lɛ?»
Lɛɛ, Pol ɓáy Silas yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mu ɗaa law-a ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa mù, ɓo ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓori riw bele.»
Falɛ ku lɛ, i ɓaa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay ha̰ ni, ɓáy nzoɓri riw bele ká i kaw ɓil puo ɓe na.
Ká suŋke ku hɔy na, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ hul sal na fa̰a ri a vǎa wàa nṵɔ ɓari na ha ri. Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy nda̰w ze, ka ha ri ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii, ɓáy nzoɓ ɓil puo ɓeri riw bele.
Falɛ lɛ, ka yḭiŋra ri vi ɓil puo ɓe, a nzaa fe sṵm ha ri sṵ. Ɓe ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓeri riw bele na, i ɗaa bawda suoriya ɓay tul law-ri ká i ɗaa ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
Zaɗka nzaaruo sil na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ réke tul puori pie dɔma̰y mgbaka mgbamri na ha ri vǎa ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na mii, «Mu pɔ́ŋ nzoɓ niri key na ha ri zɔ́l.»
Lɛɛ, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na, vǎa ɓaa ha̰ Pol mii: «Nzoɓ réke tul puori pie nzaapeɗ ha̰ mì ɓay haŋa mì pɔŋ rì zɔl. Munu zu lɛ, faa ɗo hɔy, ì tḭi í se zaɗ seɗ ɓaarì ɓáy ɗɛkɛkɛ ro!»

Roo lɛ, Pol ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ mgbaka mgbamri na mii: «Hay! Ɓuru na, ɓuru ɓa leɗ ɓil puɔ ká Rɔm. Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara ì mgba ɓuru, í ndaka ɓuru ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri taŋ fɔ́ŋ ɓay hɔy, a í ɗaa ɓuru zuɔ hul sal. Lɛɛ, timbɛɗɛ key rɔɔ, ì hii ɓay tína ɓuru ɓa muni hɔy lɛ? Munu ya mgbaŋ! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ɓari nzoɓ réke tul puori kḭ i vi sùo-ri nda̰w rɔɔ, í tína ɓuru ɓáy!»

Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mgbaka mgbamri na, i yḭ̀i í vǎa ziŋ nzoɓ réke tul puori na í ɓaa ɓayke ha ri. Zaɗka i laa mii, Pol ɓáy Silas i ɓa leɗ ɓil puɔ ká Rɔm na báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri ha ri tɔ yɛr yɛr ɓay tul fe ká i ɗaa ziŋ ri na.
Ro, í vi sùo-ri kḭ í vbi Pol ɓáy Silas law huoke í tina ri, rɔɔ í koɗ ri ɓay haŋa ri tḭi saa puo ɓari na í zɔ́l.
Tḭ́i saa hul sal na, Pol ɓáy Silas se puo Lidi, í kɔ yṵ ɓari í ɗaa wa̰ra ɓo ɓil law nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele na nda̰w rɔɔ, i pɔŋ ri í zɔl ɓáy.
Pol ɓáy Silas i kal ɓáy faa ká tḭi Amfipoli ɓáy Apoloni, a í tḭi Tesalonik ká Ziɓri ɗo ɓáy *hul mbṵ́ kḭ ká ɗi.

Lɛɛ, Pol kal a se hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri na munu káʼa ɗaa tii ni tii ɓaŋguɔ na. Ká ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ramri ká say na, ka ma̰y ɓay ká se tul ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ziŋ nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na ku.

Ka tina sa̰w Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a kǐɛke ri ha ri kɔ ta-taŋ mii: *Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, ɗo nun haŋa ni kɔ sɛkɛ fe a hu, rɔɔ a tḭi saa luɔ huɗ. Ka ɓaa mii: «Ɓe Zezu ni key ká mì ɓaa ɓay ɓe ha rì na, ɓe kḭ ze ka ɓa Krisi.»

Báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓ ha̰nɛri ká i laa ɓay ɓe na, ɓayke haw ri rɛ̰m a í zuɔ ziŋ Pol ɓáy Silas. Rɔɔ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ŋgḭi ɓamba ká í ɓa Gɛrɛkri í ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓáy ruɔ má̰yri ká nun-ri nzɛ-nzɛ na i zuɔ ziŋ ri nda̰w.

Roo lɛ, Ziɓ ha̰wri na i ɗaa sere ziŋ ri. Ro, í se faa buo í vǎa mbṵ nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká gɔr munu ha ri tḭi hiyaw hiyaw í fɛrɛ kér ɓay nzoɓri ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na. I se vbuɓuɓu í rìi ɓil puo Zaso̰n, í nzaara Pol ɓáy Silas ɓay mgbaka ri í séke pol ruɔ nzoɓri.

Lɛɛ, i ziŋ ri ya. Ze í mgba Zaso̰n ɓáy nzoɓ mbika law ha̰nɛri í kuɔ ri, í séke luo nzoɓ réke tul puo ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na ku, í guu fe ká tul-ri goɗoɗo goɗoɗo í ɓǎake ɓay mii: «Nzoɓ niri key na i yɔklɔ kér ɓay nzoɓri riw bele ká tusiri key, ze timbɛɗɛ key nda̰w rɔɔ i vi zaɗ ni key,
lɛ, ɓe Zaso̰n na ka mgba ri ɓáy kere ɓa luo-ɛ! Ɓari riw bele key na, i ɗaa fe í túŋke *bol kusol Mbay Sezar, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i ɓaa mii, mbay kḭ ɓoɗ ɗo ku, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezu.»
Báyḭi lɛ, ɓay ɓari ká i ɓaa na, fɛrɛ kér ɓay ruɔ nzoɓri, ɓáy nzoɓ réke tul puori na.
Ze í ha̰ Zaso̰n ɓáy nzoɓ mbika law ha̰wri na, i puo mbɔl ɓay ká nzoɓ réke tul puori ɗaa ɓo tul-ri na nda̰w rɔɔ, i pɔŋ ri ha ri zɔl ɓáy.
Zaɗ sii báyḭi lɛ, Pol ɓáy Silas na yṵ ɓariri ha ri se ɓa Bere. Zaɗka i tḭi ɗi na, i kal í se *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri.

Zaɗɛ ku na, i ziŋ nzoɓri ká i nzɛ kal Ziɓri ká Tesalonik, ɓari na i ya̰a Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy kere. Nam ɓáy nam na, i bɛklɛ mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay kɔ́kɔ, wa̰a, ɓay ká Pol ɓaa na ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ kḭ zu lɛ?
Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ku ŋgḭi ɓamba i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu. Ká sakra Gɛrɛkri na, má̰y feziŋari, ɓáy wa̰rari ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu nda̰w.
Roo lɛ, zaɗka Ziɓri ká Tesalonik laa mii, Pol ɗo ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká Bere na báyḭi lɛ, i vi í yɔklɔ ruɔ nzoɓri ha̰ kér ɓay ɓari fɛrɛ.
Báyḭi lɛ, yṵ Polri mgba roy ya, í uru koɗ hɔy í su Pol ɓa nzaa maambii ɓay haŋa ni ka mbi tuo a zɔ́l. Lɛɛ, Silas ɓáy Timote ze i tɔ̀ŋ fal.

Ɓari nzoɓri ká i su Pol na, i se ziŋ ni kpṵru í tḭ́ike Atɛn. Yḭ́i ɓari ɓa puɔ na báyḭi lɛ, Pol pie ri ɓay haŋa ri vǎa ɓaa ha̰ Silas ɓáy Timote, ɓo, zaɗka faa ɗo ɗi lɛ, i vǎa ziŋ ɓeri ká lew ɓa vaa.
Zaɗka Pol kaw Atɛn, a giyaŋ vika Silas ɓáy Timote na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ wṵru ɓariri ká i ɗaa ya̰a ɓil puoke ku kpol kpol. Ɓe ze ɗaa ha̰ law-ɛ mbíke huu ɓay tul wṵruri ká i koɗ na.
Báyḭi lɛ, ká ɓil *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri na ka ma̰y ɓay ziŋ Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na. Nam ɓáy nam na, ka se kaa a ɓaa ɓay ziŋ nzoɓri káʼa ziŋ ri ká ɗi.

Nzoɓ fére nzoɓri nun nzɛm ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa nzoɓ fal ŋgaŋ Epikuri ɓáy Esitokiri ɓaa ɓay ziŋ ni nda̰w. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii: «Ɓay ḭi na ro ze, nzoɓ rɔɗi nu na ɓaa ku lɛ?» Nzoɓ ha̰wri laa lɛ, ɓaa mii: «Rìi fe káʼa ka-káa ɓay ká se tul wṵru puo kḭri.» I ɓaa munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Pol ka-káa ɓay ká se tul Zezu ɓáy tḭ́i nzoɓri saa luɔ huɗ.
Ro, í sùu ni ɓo pol-ri, í séke ni zaɗ fɔ́ŋ ɓay ká tul kuo Aropaze, rɔɔ í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ɓay fe fére fie ká mù fere nzoɓri na, ɓuru máa ɓay láa sa̰wke ká nzaa-a ya lɛ,
ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓay ɓori ká mù ɓaa ká tɔɗɔ ɓo suku ɓuru na ɓa ɓay fie, ze ɓuru hii ɓay láa sa̰w ɓayke.»
Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓ Atɛnri riw bele, ɓáy nzoɓ varuri ká i naa ziŋ ri na, i mbi sa̰w síe í kaw ɓa láa ɓa ɓay, a í lo soro ɓay fie na ku hɔy.

Báyḭi lɛ, Pol uru a ɗo siya ká sakra ɓari ká i ɗo Aropaze na, a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì nzoɓri ká Atɛn na, mì kɔ rì lɛ, ì ɓa nzoɓri ká ì puo wṵruri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ɓamba ɓáy faa feri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele.

Zaɗka mì ha̰ari ɓil puo ɓaarì ká mí bɛklɛ zaɗri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká ì puo wṵru ɓaarì ká ɗi na, *tutakra fe poy ɓaarì kara mì kɔ mbḭw ká ɗi ká i vbie fe ɗo ɗi mii, “Tisaw key na, ɓa taa wṵru ká nzoɓ kɔ sa̰wke ya.” Nda ndaɗ! Munu zu lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na, fe ká ì kɔ sa̰wke ya a í ruo ni na, mì vi ɓay tína sa̰wke ha rì laa.
Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗaa tusiri ɓáy feri riw bele ká ɗo ɗi na, ka ɓa Mbay nulue nda̰w, Mbay tusiri key nda̰w pi. Ɓe na ka kaw ɓil hul ká nduo nzoɓ ɗaa ya.
Ka se síe haŋa nzoɓ ɗaa fe ha̰ ni ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe mbḭw puo ni ya; ɓe kḭ ze ka ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele kumnun nda̰w, ɔ̰mi nda̰w, a ha ri feri riw bele nda̰w pi.

Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa nzoɓ mbḭw pola. Ɓáy faa nzoɓke na, ka há̰ke sa̰w nzoɓri tḭi ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele, a ɗaa ri kaw tusiri key, a tuu ri sewke ká i káwke ɗi ɓáy faa tabelemke tabelemke munu káʼa waa ká ɓil law-ɛ piɛɗ lew hɔy na.
Ka ɗaa munu, a hii ɓay haŋa ri nzaara ni í kaa tɔrɔm, i nzaa faa í mamke zaɗ kpṵru, kɔ ya lɛ i zíŋ ni. Tusuɛke lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɗo ɗi ya ká sakra naari key,
ɓay ḭi lɛ, taambɔl ɓe na ze náa káwkeri ɓáy kumnun, a náa séri náa ɗáari fe. Náa ɗori munu ká nzoɓ mbika tul sim ɓaarì ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii: “Náa ɓári vi-eri.”

Munu ká náa ɓari vi-eri na, kɔkɔ ká náa kérri mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo munu ɓa wṵru ká nzoɓri ɗaa ɓáy lari ká ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri, mase lari pie, mase tisaw, ká i ker ɓáy tul-ri ku hɔy í fɛl na ku ya.

Sew ká nzoɓri ɗaa fe ɗáa mbúo taŋ kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭi fal fe ɗáa ka̰ayake ku na mbǎa. A roo lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na, ka ɗi nzoɓri riw bele ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ riw bele ɓay haŋa ri suo kér ɓay ɓari ká tul fe ɗáa ya̰a ɓari.

Tusuɛke lɛ, ka tuu nam káʼa kúŋke sal ɓay zuɔ tul nzoɓri riw bele ká tusiri key ɓáy zaɗɛ ɓáy faa nzoɓ káʼa naa ni na. Ɓa fe káʼa ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele kɔ ta-taŋ ɓáy nam káʼa tina ni saa sakra nzoɓ huɗeri ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun.»
Zaɗka i laa ɓay tḭ́i nzoɓ saa luɔ huɗ ká Pol ɓaa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri siɛ ni. A nzoɓ ha̰wri laa lɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Nam kḭ kara, ɓuru láa ɓay ɓo na ɓáy!»
Ɓe mini ze Pol zɔ̌lke ká sakra ɓari na.

Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri zuɔ ziŋ ni í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu. Sakra ɓari ku na, Deni ká ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra *nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri ká tul kuo Aropaze nda̰w, má̰y mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Damaris nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy nzoɓ ha̰wri na, i ɗo ɗi nda̰w pi.
Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, Pol uru ká Atɛn a se ɓa Kɔrɛ̰te.

Zaɗkaʼa tḭi ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, ka ziŋ Ziɓ mbḭw munu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Akilas. Puo ká i mboŋ ni ká ɗi na ɗo kuɗu zaɗ ká Po̰n. Ka vi saa tusiri Itali timbɛɗɛ rɔɓay ɓáy má̰y ɓe Prisil, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Mbay Sezar ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Kolod na mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ Ziɓri riw bele ha ri tḭi saa ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Rɔm. Pol na se a vǎa kɔ ri.
Munu ká peɗ ɗáa ɓari maa kḭ mbḭw hɔy ɓa peɗ sá̰a huɔri í ɗaa ɓa hul puɗi na, ka ɗaa puo ziŋ ri, a í ɗaa peɗ ziŋ kḭ mbḭw hɔy.
Ɓáy ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ramri mbḭw mbḭw riw bele na, Pol se *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri, a fere nzoɓri ɓay ká se tul Zezu *Krisi, a nzaa faa ha̰ Ziɓri nda̰w, Gɛrɛkri kara nda̰w ya̰a ɓayke.

Lɛɛ, zaɗka Silas ɓáy Timote uru saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n í vi Kɔrɛ̰te na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa sùo-ɛ nduo ɓil Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ hɔy riw bele, a ka-káa a ɓǎake nasi ɓay ha̰ Ziɓri mii, Zezu ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na.

Roo lɛ, Ziɓri na tuŋ ɓay ɓe na ŋgereŋ í raɗ ni. Munu ká i ɗaa ŋgɔŋ ziŋ ni na, ka uru a taa nduo-ɛ ká tul-ri a kpuo kusal ká gari ɓe, a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Zaɗka ì wṵru faa lɛ, ɓa ɓay ɓaarì ro zu. A ɓi lɛ, ɓayke ti tul-i ya. Tii sa̰wke vuri key na, mì séke ɓa luo nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya laa ro.»
Tḭ́i saa hul mbṵ́ kḭ na ku báyḭi lɛ, ka se puo leɗban mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Titiyus Zustus. Ɓe na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ká ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká hul ɓe ɓáy hul mbṵ kḭ Ziɓri huu kḭ nik na.

Lɛɛ, Krispus ká ɓa mbay tul hul mbṵ́ kḭ ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓeri riw bele na, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay. Lɛɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká Kɔrɛ̰te ká i laa ɓay ká Pol ɓaa na, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu nda̰w, ha ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii.
Báyḭi lɛ, nam mbḭw munu fe tina nun ha̰ Pol ɓa suŋ, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu ɗaa hḭɛ ya! Roo lɛ, mu ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri ɓaŋguɔ ha̰ nzaa-a ka hú mù ká ɗi ya,
ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì saɗ ziŋ mù. Nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ti ɗáa nduo zaa sùo-ɔ ɓay ɗáa fe sɛkɛ ziŋ mù ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo key na, nzoɓri ká i ɓa taa ɓiri na, i ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗo ɗi ku.»
Ɓe ze ha̰ Pol kǎwke Kɔrɛ̰te na mbiimbam mbḭw ɓáy few yie, a fere nzoɓri Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
Ɓáy sew ká Galio̰n kaw ɓa nzoɓ réke kuɗu zaɗ ká Akayi na, Ziɓri uru í mbṵ nzaa-ri í ɗaa so tul Pol í mgba ni, í séke ni zaɗ fɔ́ŋ ɓay
í ɓaa ha̰ Galio̰n mii: «Leɗban key na ka nzaa faa ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni se maa ɓáy *bol kusol *Moyze ya.»

Zaɗka Pol aa nzi-ɛ ɓay yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay na báyḭi lɛ, Galio̰n ɓaa ha̰ Ziɓri mii: «Ɓaarì Ziɓri, ì laa ɓay ɓi key! Ɓa fe huɗ, mase ɓa fe ka̰aya rɔɔ, nzoɓke ɗaa lɛ, mì iki law-i mí laa ɓay ɓaarì na.
Roo lɛ, munu ká ɓa ma̰y ɓay ká se tul ɓayri, mase riŋri, mase bol kusol ɓaarì kḭ hɔy na, ɓa peɗ ɓaarì ro zu! Kḭri ɓayri ká mini key na, mì ti kúŋ sal ɓayke ya.»
Falɛ ku lɛ, Galio̰n na nii ri saa zaɗ fɔ́ŋ ɓay na.

Ro, ɓari riw bele na i ɗaa so tul Sostɛn ká ɓa mbay tul hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri na í mgba ni, í tii sa̰w ndáka ni ká nzaa faa zaɗ fɔ́ŋ ɓay na. Roo lɛ, fe nuri riw bele ku na, Galio̰n ɗaa fe mbḭw ká ɗi ya.

Pol na kaw Kɔrɛ̰te bole ɗi maa fe. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka waɗa yṵ-ɛri, rɔɔ ɓe ɓáy Prisil ɓáy Akilasri i hil í kaw ɓil bawda tuo ɓay séke tusiri Siri. Pola rɔɔ ɓay káw ɓil tuo na, ka sṵu tul-e ká Sankere, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka hii ɔ́rɔ ɓie ɓay káʼa mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na.
Zaɗka i tḭi Efɛz na, Pol pɔŋ bǎw seɗ ɓeri ká ɗi, a kal a se *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri, a ma̰y ɓay ziŋ ri ká ɗi.
I koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka sóro nam ɓe ndḭi, a káw zíŋ ɓari nam maa fe rɔɔ a zɔ́l ɓáy. Roo lɛ, ka hii ziŋ ri ya.
Zaɗkaʼa pɔŋ ri ɓay zɔ́l na báyḭi lɛ, ka waɗa ri mii: «Zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii lɛ, mì yḭ́i ɓay ví káw zíŋ rì ɓáy.» Lɛɛ, ka kaw ɓil bawda tuo saa Efɛz a se ɓa Sezare.
Zaɗka i tḭi Sezare na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗì saa ɓil bawda tuo na, rɔɔ a kal a se Zuruzalɛm ɓay híi soko ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká ɗi. Falɛ ku rɔɔ a zɔl a se Antiyos ká tusiri Siri.
Zaɗkaʼa kaw Antiyos bole ɗi maa fe ndḭi na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a se kuɗu zaɗ ká Galasi, ɓáy Firizi a ha̰ hṵrusuo ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele ká ɗi.
Ziɓ mbḭw munu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Apolos, sa̰w puo ɓe ɓa Alezandere vi Efɛz. Ka ɓa nzoɓ rḭ́i ɓay, a kɔ ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru taŋ ɓamba tasiri.

Ka ɓa nzoɓ ká i fere ni Faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu, rɔɔ ɓe na ka suo a ka-káa ɓay a fere nzoɓri ɓay ká se tul Zezu ɓáy zaɗɛ. Ɓay ɓe kara zaŋ sùo nda̰w, roo lɛ, ɗáa tul nduo mbii ká Za̰a ɗaa hɔy ze ka kɔ.

Ka tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ ká ɓil *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri. Zaɗka Prisil ɓáy Akilas laa ɓay ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, i mgba ni ɗo fi mbḭw í tina sa̰w ɓay ká se tul Faa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru káʼa kɔ taŋ ya ɓáy na kaɗ kaɗ ha̰ ni laa.

Munu káʼa waa ɓay séke kuɗu zaɗ ká Akayi na, yṵ-ɛri ká i ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri na ha̰ ni hṵrusuo í ɗaa mbeɗe ha̰ ni séke ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká ɗi, ha ri mgbáke ni ɓa sùo-ri ɓáy kere. Zaɗkaʼa tḭi ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká i vi ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri ɓáy faa law kere Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka sɔ ri ŋgḭi ɓamba,

ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ma̰y ɓay ziŋ Ziɓri ká zaɗ ruɔ, a mba tul-ri, a kiɛ ri fe ɓáy faa ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ha ri kɔ mii, Zezu ɓa *Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na.
Zaɗka Apolos kaw Kɔrɛ̰te rɔɓay na, Pol se ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ ká ɓil kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi kpṵru a tḭ́ike Efɛz. Lɛɛ, ka ziŋ nzoɓ mbika law ha̰nɛri ká ɗi,
a vbi ri ɓay mii: «Zaɗka ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul Zezu na wa̰a, ì ziŋ Tem Law Pie ziŋ zu lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓay ká se tul Tem Law Pie na, tɔɗɔ ɓo suku ɓuru ya ɓáy.»
Báyḭi lɛ, Pol vbi ri mii: «Wa̰a, ɗáa tul nduo mbii taa ha̰a ze, i ɗáa rì nduo ɗi lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɗáa tul nduo mbii taa Za̰a ze, i ɗaa tul ɓuru nduo ɗi.»

Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri rɔɓay mii: «Ɗáa tul nduo mbii ká Za̰a ɗaa nzoɓri nduo ɗi na, ɓay tul nzoɓri ká i suo kér ɓay ɓari ká tul fe ɗáa ya̰a ɓari, roo lɛ, Za̰a na ɓaa ha ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul nzoɓ káʼa ví fal-ɛ vuku. Ɓe ze ɓa Zezu.»
Zaɗka i laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, i ha ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu.
Lɛɛ, zaɗka Pol ɗaa nduo ɓo tul-ri na, Tem Law Pie vi tul-ri, ha ri tii sa̰w ɓáa nzaa ɓay kḭri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ, í ɓaa ɓay ká i ya̰a saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ha̰ nzoɓri.
Nzoɓkeri ku riw bele na, tul-ri maa duɔ falɛ siɗi.

Ɓáy káw Pol ká Efɛz na, ka se *hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri ɓaŋguɔ. Ká ɓil few ká say na, ka ɓaa ɓay ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ, a ka-káa ɓay ká se tul réke mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a nzaa faa ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ya̰a ɓayke na ɓa sùo ɓay.

Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká ɗi ɓa nzoɓ law ŋgɔŋɔri, í mbii suku-ri í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul ɓay káʼa ɓaa na ya, a í ɓaa ɓay ka̰aya se tul Faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ na. Ɓe ze Pol náake sùo-ɛ a pɔŋ ri, a fa̰a nzoɓ mbika lawri a fere ri fe nam ɓáy nam ká ɓil hul fe fére ká Tiranus fere nzoɓri fe ká ɗi.
Pol ɗaa peɗ key na munu ɓa mbiimbam siɗi ha̰ nzoɓri ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi riw bele, Ziɓri ɓáy Gɛrɛkri kara laa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay na.
Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa fe saŋri ká ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ɓáy faa Pol.

Ɓe mini ze, nzoɓri vǎa fa̰a vay gari ɓe ɓáy gari ndúo ɗo sùo-ɛ kara nda̰w, í séke ɓay vǎa ɗáa taa sùo nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri ɓo ha̰ sùo-ri ka vaa; a nzoɓ ha̰yri ká temndayari ɗo tul-ri na kara, temndayakeri na tḭi nda̰w pi.

Báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓ ha̰nɛri ká i se ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ ɓay nii temndayari na, i nzaa faa ɓay níi temndayari saa tul nzoɓri ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu na nda̰w. I ɓaa ha̰ temndayari mii: «Ɓáy riŋ Zezu ká Pol káake káa na, ɓuru ɓaa ha rì, ì tḭi ká tul-ri!»
Nzoɓri ká i ɗaa fe key na, tul-ri tɔnɔ say, i ɓa vu Sevari ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ *fe poy ká luo Ziɓri.
Báyḭi lɛ, temndaya yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Zezu na, mì tuu ni tuu; a Pol kara, ɓa ve lɛ na, mì kɔ-kɔ. Wa̰a, ɓaarì na ì ɓa nzoɓ veri lɛ?»
Ro, nzoɓ ká temndaya ɗo tul-e na zo kuruk ɓo tul-ri a mba ri ɓáy hṵrusuo riw bele. Ka ɗara ri mboloŋ mboloŋ ha ri tḭi ɗul saa hula nduɔɗi nduɔɗi ɓáy nṵɔ mbḭsi mbḭsi.
Ziɓri ɓáy Gɛrɛkri riw bele ká i naa Efɛz ká í laa ɓayke na, hḭɛ ɗaa ri riw bele ha ri ɗaa riŋ ɗika ɓo tul riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu.
Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu na, i vi ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri í naa nzaa-ri, í kḭi ɓay fe ɗáa ka̰aya ɓari riw bele ɓa kɛlɛ.

Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká ɓil-ri ku ká i ɗaa fe ɗáa mgbḭi na, i fa̰a mbeɗe mgbḭi ɓari í víke ha ri tay ɓáy huu kpɔlɔk kpɔlɔk ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele. Zaɗka i ɗaa suy larike riw bele na, maa lari peɗ nam isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ síŋ ndeɓe.
Ɓe mini ze, ɓáy faa hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛmbay na, ɓay ɓe yǎ̰ake zaɗ ɓáy hṵrusuo ɓa pola pola.

Fal fekeri na ku báyḭi lɛ, Pol waa ká ɓil law-ɛ ɓay séke ɓa kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n ɓáy Akayi, rɔɔ ɓay kál ɓay séke Zuruzalɛm ɓáy. Ka ɓaa mii: «Zaɗka mì se Zuruzalɛm na lɛ, ɗo nun haŋa mì se ti mbḭw mí kɔ Rɔm.»
Báyḭi lɛ, ka pie Timote ɓáy Erasi, ká i ɓa nzoɓ sɔkɔ ni na ha ri se kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n na. Roo lɛ, ɓe na, ka kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi nam maa fe rɔɓay.
Ká ɓil sewke ku na, bawda ɓay uru ɓay tul Faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
Nzoɓ mbḭw munu ɓa nzoɓ túo fe suku riŋ-ɛ ɓa Demeterus ɗaa vu hulri rìi bawda hul wṵru ɓari ká i ɗi ɓa Artemis. Demeterus ɓáy nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri na, i ziŋ fe ká ɗi ɓamba.
Báyḭi lɛ, nam mbḭw munu, ka mbṵ nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri ɓáy nzoɓ fe túo kṵ-ɛri riw bele ɗo tul kḭ mbḭw hɔy, a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì yṵ-iri, ì kɔ nda̰w, taambɔl peɗ na key ze, náa tḭ́ikeri suku.

Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, fe ká leɗban ni ká ɓa Pol ɗaa na, ì kɔ nda̰w, í laa ɓayke ɓáy suku-rì nda̰w. Ka ɓaa mii, wṵru ká nzoɓri ɗaa ɓáy nduo-ri na ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru taa tusuɛke ya. Ɓe mini ze, ka ziŋ faa a gur hṵrusuo ruɔ nzoɓri ha ri hie fekeri na mbǎa. Ɓa zaɗ ni ká Efɛz key huo-ɛ hɔy ya, roo lɛ, tɔ̀ŋ ndḭi hɔy ɓay haŋa ni ya̰a kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi riw bele.

Ɗo munu lɛ, ɓa peɗ naari hɔy ze a ɓíɛ ya, roo lɛ, bawda riŋ ɗika hul wṵru Artemis na hɔy kara, nzoɓri kɔ́kɔ ɓa fe ya nda̰w, a riŋ ɗika ɓe Artemis ká nzoɓri koɗ ni ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi ɓáy zaɗri riw bele ká tusiri key na hɔy kara, a yḭ́i ɓa fal nda̰w pi.»
Zaɗka i laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, law-ri fa̰a ri puu-u, í tii sa̰w ɗáa fe ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ mii: «Artemis, wṵru Efɛzri na ŋgɔɓ mba wṵru ha̰wri riw bele!»

Ɓay tul fe gúu ɓari na, law nzoɓri ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo riw bele nzaa ri ha ri se tama tama. I mgba Gayus ɓáy Arisitak ká i ɓa bǎw seɗ Pol ká í ɓa nzoɓ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n na, í takra í se fal kḭ buɗ buɗ riw bele í vǎa mbṵ tul kḭ ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ luye.
Pol na hii ɓay ɗoko sakra ruɔ nzoɓri sùo-ɛ, roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri haa ni.
Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa nzoɓ réke tul kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi ká i ɓa nzoɓ buɔ Pol kara, i pie nzoɓ ɓa luo-ɛ ɓay kóɗ ni ha̰ ni ka mbi ɓal-ɛ nda zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ luye na ya.
Ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ ruɔ na, feri nduo kḭ ɗo maŋ. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri guu fe kḭrɛ ɓoɗ, nzoɓ ha̰wri guu fe kḭrɛ ɓoɗ nda̰w, a ruɔkeri laa lɛ, i kɔ sa̰w fe ká i mbṵ́ke kḭ na ya.

Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri na ɓaa sa̰w ɓayke ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Alezandere ká Ziɓri suru ni ɗo pola na. Lɛɛ, ka ura nduo-ɛ a laŋ ká pol ruɔ nzoɓri ɓay haŋa ri ta̰a ɓo, a ɓaa ɓay ha ri laa.
Roo lɛ, zaɗka i kɔ ni ɓa Ziɓ na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa fe ɓáy nzaa-ri riw bele gɔ̌m maa sa̰w síe siɗi í ɓaa mii: «Artemis, wṵru Efɛzri na, ŋgɔɓ mba wṵru ha̰wri riw bele!»

Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ɗáa mbeɗe ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na ziŋ faa a ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri ɗo ɗɛkɛkɛ a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì nzoɓri ká Efɛz! Nzoɓri riw bele kɔ ŋgɛrɛpuo naari ká Efɛz na ɓa puo ká kɔrɔ hul wṵru Artemis ká ɓa wṵru luye! I kɔ Efɛz ɓa puo ká puu wṵruke tɔɗɔ saa tumbam a ɗo ɗi na ya lɛ woo!
Feke ku na, faa ká ɓay haŋa nzoɓ má̰yke ɓayke na tiya. Munu zu lɛ, ɗo nun haŋa rì kaw ɗɛkɛkɛ, í ɗaa fe ɓáy takra poɗ poɗ ya.
Nzoɓ niri ká i fa̰a ri í víke ri key na, i fa̰a feri ká ɓil hul wṵruri ya nda̰w, í tḭiri wṵru naari ya nda̰w pi.
Zaɗka Demeterus ɓáy nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri hii ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ lɛ, nam fɔ́ŋ ɓay, ɓáy nzoɓ fɔ́ŋ ɓayri ɗo ɗi ku ká i ɗáa ɓayke na. Ɓe ze ɓa zaɗ ká i séke ɗi í ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ.
Zaɗka i hii ɓay ɗáa ɓay kḭ ɓoɗ lɛ, i léke ɓayke ɓáy faake ɓáy faa *bol kusol puo ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ ruɔ na.
Feri ká kal ká vuri key na, nzoɓri ká Rɔm i mgbaka í ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul naari, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓuru maa ɓay ɓáa sa̰w ɓay mbṵ́ kḭke na ta-taŋ ha ri ya̰a ɓayke ya.»
Fal ɓay nzoɓ ɗáa mbeɗe na ku báyḭi lɛ, ka ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri zɔl faa puɔ.
Zaɗka law nzoɓ puɔri ɓáy kér ɓay ɓari nda siri na báyḭi lɛ, Pol mbṵ nzoɓ mbika lawri a huo law-ri. Falɛ ku rɔɔ, a waɗa ri a zɔl ɓa kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n na ɓáy.
