Lɛɛ, Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mgba mì ha̰ leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na sùu mì se tul lóŋ kuo ká gaŋ ɓamba mbɛvbḭw, a kiɛ mì ŋgɛrɛpuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓa Zuruzalɛm na ɗì saa nulue ká luo-ɛ ɓa tusiri.
Ŋgɛrɛpuoke ku na, zaɗ taŋa ká kiɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo na, tḭi saa ɗi a ndṵy mbeɗera mbeɗera. Ka ɗo ver ver munu ká tisaw kere ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa

I mbuo kɔ̀kɔ dudu hi-hii nda̰w, a gaŋ nda̰w í kǐrike ŋgɛrɛpuo na. Faakeri ɓa duɔ falɛ siɗi; leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ɓa duɔ falɛ siɗi ze i kɔrɔ faakeri na. Ká tul faa hulri na, i vbie riŋ sa̰w ka̰ni leɗ Izarayɛlri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi ɗo ɗi ɗo ɗi.
I pɔŋ faa hul ɓa say ɗo fi tḭ́i síe, say ɗo fi riŋ síe, say ɗo fi hoɗo, say ɗo fi gel.
Kɔ̀kɔ dudu na, i mbuo ɗo tul tisawri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi ká i vbie riŋ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ Vu Baɗu ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na ɗo ɗi mbḭw mbḭw bele.

Falɛ lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓaa ɓay ziŋ mì na, ka mgba ŋgasikri líe fe ká i ɗaa ɓáy lari ká ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri ɗo nduo-ɛ ɓay líeke ŋgɛrɛpuo na nda̰w, faa hulkeri nda̰w, rɔɔ kɔ̀kɔ dudu ká kiri ɗi na nda̰w.
Ŋgɛrɛpuoke na tḭwke maa kḭ: píeke ɓáy áake maa ɓa kḭ. Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lie ŋgɛrɛpuo na ɓáy ŋgasikri líe fe ɓe na, lɛ, píeke na ɓa
Ka lie gaŋa kɔ̀kɔ dudu na nda̰w, lɛ, ɓa tukṵru nduo isɔɗ ɓáy síŋ niŋ pa̰rɛ niŋ, ɓa nduo fe líe nzoɓri ze leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na líeke
Kɔ̀kɔ na i mbuo ɓáy tisaw kere ká larike ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ká i ɗi ɓa
Tigba̰a kɔ̀kɔ ká kiri ŋgɛrɛpuoke na, i ɗew ɓáy tisaw kere ká larike ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ɓáy kḭrɛ ɓoɗ ɓoɗ. Titire tisaw tigba̰a hul ká i ɗaa ɓo na, i ɗaa ɓáy tisaw ká i ɗi ɓa
tisaw ndeke ɗi ndeɓeke na i ɗi ɓa
Faa hulri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na ɓa pa̰ra zaw kereri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi ká larike ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ká i ɗi ɓa
Roo lɛ, ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke ku na, mì kɔ hul ka̰ni ká ɗi ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Hṵrusuo Luye ɓáy Vu Baɗu na ze i ɓa hul ka̰nike
Ŋgɛrɛpuo na se síe síe, mase few rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ri taŋ zaɗ ká ɗi ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗ taŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kiɛ ni na, taŋ zaɗ kaɗ kaɗ ká ɗi, a Vu Baɗu laa lɛ, ɓa huu ndele ká puoke.
Nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká tusiri key na, i ɗoko ɓil zaɗ taŋa ɓe, a mbayri ká tusiri key kara, i séke ɓáy feziŋa ɓari ká ɗi.
Faa hulkeri na a ɗoko hɔy ká ɓisie; nzoɓ ti dár ɗo ɗi ya mgbaŋ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, suŋ ti ɗoko ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke na ku ya.
Nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká tusiri key na, i úru ɓáy fe riŋ ɗika ɓari ɓáy feziŋa ɓari í séke ɗi.

Ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke ku na, fe ḭ̌m mbḭw mini kara ti ríi ɗi ya, nzoɓ fe ɗáa lɔrɔri ya nda̰w, nzoɓ kúɗ ɓayri ya nda̰w. Ɓa ɓari huo-ri kḭ hɔy ká riŋ-ri ɗo ɓil mbeɗe pam ká ɓa taa Vu Baɗu na ze i ríi ɗi.
Falɛ ku lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na kiɛ mì nduo mbii káw ɓáy kumnun ká ndṵy a taŋ ka̰rara tḭi saa kariŋgaw mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Vu Baɗu,
a uo ká law sikɗa faa ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke na. Ká sikɗa nduo mbiiri ká siɗi na, puu káw ɓáy kumnun ɗo ɗi
Feri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru faɗ na ti ɗoko mbǎa. Kariŋgaw mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Vu Baɗu ze a ɗoko ɗi. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri na, i ruo ni.
I kɔ́kɔ nun-ɛ

Suŋ ti tiika ɗi mbǎa nda̰w, nzoɓ ti séke síe zaɗ taŋa huu ndele ya nda̰w, zaɗ taŋa síe ya nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa zaɗ taŋa ɓe taŋ ká tul-ri, a í re mbay mbiimbam ɓáy mbiimbam ɓaŋguɔ.

Falɛ ku lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓaa ha̰ mì mii: «Ɓaykeri ku na ɓa sùo ɓay a maa ɓay ɗáa law ɓo ɗi. Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ha̰ Tem ɓe ha̰ nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzi-ɛ na, pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓe ɓay kíɛ nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri fe káʼa vika vuku.»
Zezu ɓaa mii: «Ì laa key! Ndḭi hɔy lɛ, mì vika. Nzoɓ ká ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓayri ká uru saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key lɛ, suoriya ɓa taa ɓe.»

Ɓi Za̰a na, fekeri ku riw bele na, mì laa ɓáy suk-i nda̰w, a mí kɔ ɓáy nun-i gbak gbak nda̰w pi. A zaɗka mì laa ɓay fekeri, a mí kɔ ɓáy nun-i nda̰w na báyḭi lɛ, mì huku pol leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kiɛ mì fekeri na ɓay rúo ni.

Roo lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ mì mii: «Hay, mu ɗaa munu ya. Ɓi na, mì ɓa nzoɓ peɗ munu ká ɓo nda̰w, munu ká yṵ-ɔri ká i ɓa *nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, rɔɔ munu ká ɓari riw bele ká i ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓayri ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key nda̰w na. Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze mu ruo ni.»
Falɛ ku lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ mì ɓáy mii: «Ɓayri ká uru saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key na, mu mṵu ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ká fekeri a tḭ́i na tɔ̀ŋ ɗi mbǎa ro.

Nzoɓ ka̰aya na, ka ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓa pola, a nzoɓ fe ɗáa ḭ̌m na, ka ɗo ɓil fe ɗáa ḭ̌m na, a ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓa pola. A roo lɛ, nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ na, ka ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓa pola, a nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, ka ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe, a séke nun-ɛ ɓa pola.»
Zezu ɓaa mii: «Ì laa key! Ndḭi hɔy lɛ, mì vika. Mì mgbaka fe tunduori na ɗo nduo-i ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka maa ɓáy peɗ ɗáa ɓe.
Ɓi na, mì ɓa *Alfa ɓáy Omega, mì ɓa Titire Nzoɓ ɓáy Ɔ́rɔ Ɓie Nzoɓ, Nzoɓ Tiika Sa̰w Fe ɓáy Nzoɓ Ɔ́rɔ Ɓie Fe mgbaɗa.
Suoriya ɓa taa nzoɓri ká i wàa maagari ɓari *taŋ kaɗ kaɗ, ɓay haŋa ɓo i ɗo ɓáy faa ríi ɓáy faa kɔ̀kɔ dudu í se ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na, í sṵ lere puu káw ɓáy kumnun ɓaŋguɔ ká ɗi.

Roo lɛ, váy nzoɓri, ɓari nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭiri ɓáy nzoɓ ɗáa nun pieri nda̰w, nzoɓ ika nzoɓri nda̰w, nzoɓ kóɗ fe kḭri ká i kɔ ɓa ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓari nda̰w, mase nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká hii kúɗ ɓay a ɗaa ɓaŋguɔ nda̰w na, i ɗoko fal ŋgɛrɛpuoke na.

«Ɓi Zezu na, mì pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓi ɓay haŋa ni ka ɓaa nasi ɓay feri key na riw bele ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká zaɗ ɓoɗ ɓoɗ na. Ɓi na, mì ɓa vu bulu Mbay *Daviɗ, a mí ɓa rùo tiɓie ká taŋ gbalak nda̰w pi
Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy má̰y mbana Vu Baɗu

Ɓaarì riw bele ká ì laa ɓay ká uru saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key na, ɓi Za̰a na mì baka rì mii: nzoɓ ká ɗaa ɓay kḭ nde tul ɓayke na lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗáa ɓíɛri ká mbi ɓáy zaɗ, ká ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key na, nde tul sɛkɛ fe ká ɗo ɓay tul-e.

A nzoɓ ká naa ɓay ha̰nɛ ká ɗi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a náa fe ha̰nɛ ká ɗo ɓay tul-e, ká ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key nda̰w. Nzoɓke ti sṵŋa lere puu káw ɓáy kumnun ya nda̰w, ka ti ríi ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ya nda̰w pi.
Nzoɓ ɓáa nasi ɓay fe niri key riw bele na ɓaa mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, ndḭi hɔy lɛ, mì vika.»
Amɛm! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ! Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu, mu vi!
Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa law huoke taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ka sáɗ ziŋ nzoɓ taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri riw bele! Amɛm! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ!
